trans-unit.source: Equal to the computed value of the line-height property on the root element (typically <html>), converted to an absolute length. When used on the font-size or line-height properties of the root element, it refers to the properties' initial value.

trans-unit.source: Escaped values provided to the regexp() function must additionally be escaped from the CSS. For example, a . (period) matches any character in regular expressions. To match a literal period, you would first need to escape it using regular expression rules (to \.), then escape that string using CSS rules (to \\.).
trans-unit.target: 提供给 regexp() 函数的转义值必须另外从CSS转义。例如，一个 . （句点）匹配正则表达式中的任何字符。为了匹配一个字面量，您首先需要使用正则表达式规则对其进行转义（至 \. ），然后使用CSS规则对该字符串进行转义（至 \\. ）。

trans-unit.source: Everything else about line-based placement still works in the same way and you can mix named lines and line numbers. Naming lines is useful when creating a responsive design where you redefine the grid, rather than then needing to redefine the content position by changing the line number in your media queries, you can ensure that the line is always named the same in your definitions.

trans-unit.source: Everything on a page is part of a "formatting context", or an area which has been defined to lay out content in a particular way. A Block Formatting Context will lay child elements out according to Block Layout rules, a Flex Formatting Context will lay its children out as flex items, etc. Each formatting context has specific rules about how layout behaves when in that context.

trans-unit.source: Finally you can use max-inline-size and max-block-size as logical replacements for max-width and max-height. Try playing with the below example in the same way as before.
trans-unit.target: 最后，您可以将 max-inline-size 和 max-block-size 用作 max-width 和 max-height 的逻辑替换。尝试以与以前相同的方式播放以下示例。

trans-unit.source: Finally, note that @import and @charset obey specific algorithms and aren't affected by the cascade algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 最后，请注意 @import 和 @charset 遵循特定的算法，并且不受级联算法的影响。

trans-unit.source: Finally, note that for non-replaced inline elements, the amount of space taken up (the contribution to the height of the line) is determined by the line-height property, even though the borders and padding are still displayed around the content.
trans-unit.target: 最后，请注意，对于未替换的内联元素，占用的空间量（对线条高度的贡献）由 line-height 属性确定，即使边框和填充仍显示在内容周围。

trans-unit.source: Finally, note that for non-replaced inline elements, the amount of space taken up (the contribution to the height of the line) is determined by the line-height property, even though the borders and padding are still displayed around the content.
trans-unit.target: 最后，请注意，对于未替换的内联元素，占用的空间量（对线条高度的贡献）由 line-height 属性确定，即使边框和填充仍显示在内容周围。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the used value is transformed according to the limitations of the local environment, resulting in the actual value.
trans-unit.target: 最后,根据当地环境的限制,对使用值进行转化,得出实际值。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we come to the "screen" model. It's probably fairly obvious what this is: it's the coordinate system where the origin is located at the top-left corner of the user's entire screen space. This means that the position of a given point within a document will change if the containing window is moved, for example, or if the user's screen geometry changes (by changing display resolution or by adding or removing monitors to their system).
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们来看看 "屏幕 "模型。这可能是相当明显的:这是一个坐标系,原点位于用户整个屏幕空间的左上角。这意味着,如果移动包含的窗口,或者如果用户的屏幕几何形状发生变化(通过改变显示分辨率或在其系统中添加或删除显示器),文档中某个点的位置将发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we provide the following two rules to hide any instances of our custom element that are not defined, and display instances that are defined as block level elements:
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们提供了以下两个规则来隐藏我们自定义元素的任何未定义的实例,以及显示被定义为块级元素的实例。

trans-unit.source: Firefox 3 added support for transparent windows on Mac OS X. However, for these windows shadows were turned off and there was no way to turn them on. In Firefox 3.5 the default changed, with all windows having a shadow. This version introduced the -moz-window-shadow CSS property to provide a way to turn off unwanted shadows.
trans-unit.target: Firefox 3在Mac OS X上增加了对透明窗口的支持。但是，由于这些窗口的阴影被关闭，因此无法打开它们。在Firefox 3.5中，默认设置已更改，所有窗口均带有阴影。此版本引入了 -moz-window-shadow CSS属性，以提供一种关闭不需要的阴影的方法。

trans-unit.target: Firefox 47和更高版本支持 fullscreen display-mode 值和 browser 。Firefox 57添加了对 minimal-ui 和 standalone 值的支持。

trans-unit.source: Firefox helps developers transition to the new behavior and detect any rendering issues it may cause on their sites by printing the following warning to the JavaScript console: "Absolute positioning of table rows and row groups is now supported. This site may need to be updated because it may depend on this feature having no effect."
trans-unit.target: Firefox通过向JavaScript控制台打印以下警告,帮助开发人员过渡到新的行为,并检测它可能在其网站上引起的任何渲染问题。"现在支持表行和行组的绝对定位。这个网站可能需要更新,因为它可能依赖于这个功能没有效果。"

trans-unit.source: Fixed positioning

trans-unit.source: Fixed positioning is similar to absolute positioning, with the exception that the element's containing block is the initial containing block established by the viewport, unless any ancestor has transform, perspective, or filter property set to something other than none (see CSS Transforms Spec), which then causes that ancestor to take the place of the elements containing block. This can be used to create a "floating" element that stays in the same position regardless of scrolling. In the example below, box "One" is fixed at 80 pixels from the top of the page and 10 pixels from the left. Even after scrolling, it remains in the same place relative to the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 固定定位类似于绝对定位，不同之处在于元素的包含块是由视口建立的初始包含块，除非任何祖先将 transform ， perspective 或 filter 属性设置为非 none （请参见CSS Transforms Spec），然后导致该祖先替换包含block的元素。这可以用来创建一个“浮动”元素，无论滚动如何，它都保持在相同的位置。在下面的示例中，框“一个”固定为距页面顶部80像素，距页面10像素。即使滚动后，它仍相对于视口保持在同一位置。

trans-unit.source: Flex items are stretched such that the cross-size of the item's margin box is the same as the line while respecting width and height constraints.
trans-unit.target: Flex项目被拉伸,使项目的边框的交叉尺寸与线条相同,同时尊重宽度和高度限制。

trans-unit.source: Flex items can be aligned in the cross axis of the current line of the flex container, similar to justify-content but in the perpendicular direction. align-items sets the default alignment for all of the flex container's items, including anonymous flex items. align-self allows this default alignment to be overridden for individual flex items. (For anonymous flex items, align-self always matches the value of align-items on their associated flex container.)
trans-unit.target: 伸缩项可以在伸缩容器的当前行的横轴上对齐，类似于 justify-content 但在垂直方向上对齐。 align-items 为所有flex容器的项目（包括匿名flex项目）设置默认对齐方式。 align-self 允许针对单个弹性项目覆盖此默认对齐方式。（对于匿名弹性项目， align-self 始终与其关联的弹性容器上的 align-items 值匹配。）

trans-unit.source: Flex items have a default order value of 0, therefore items with an integer value greater than 0 will be displayed after any items that have not been given an explicit order value.
trans-unit.target: 弹性商品的默认 order 值为 0 ，因此，在未指定任何明确 order 值的商品之后，将显示整数值大于0的商品。

trans-unit.source: Flex items that are sized according to their content are sized using fit-content, not max-content.
trans-unit.target: 根据内容的大小调整的伸缩项使用fit-content而不是max-content进行大小调整。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox adds an additional complication in that the above is true when flex-direction is set to row. The properties are swapped when flexbox is set to column. Therefore, when working with flexbox it is easier to think about the main and cross axis rather than inline and block. The justify- properties are always used to align on the main axis, the align- properties on the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox增加了一个额外的复杂性，因为当 flex-direction 设置为 row 时，上述情况适用。将flexbox设置为 column 时，将交换属性。因此，在使用flexbox时，更容易考虑主轴和交叉轴，而不是内联和块。的 justify- 属性始终用于对齐上的主轴线，所述 align- 上横轴属性。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox can solve this. We make the card a flex container, with flex-direction: column. We then set the content area to flex: 1, which is the shorthand for flex: 1 1 0 — the item can grow and shrink from a flex basis of 0. As this is the only item that can grow, it takes up all available space in the flex container and pushes the footer to the bottom. If you remove the flex property from the live example you will see how the footer then moves up to sit directly under the content.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox可以解决这个问题。我们将卡片设置为flex容器，并带有 flex-direction : column 。然后，我们将内容区域设置为 flex: 1 ，这是 flex: 1 1 0 的简写-项目可以从flex的基础 0 开始增长和收缩。由于这是唯一可以增长的项目，因此它将占用flex容器中的所有可用空间，并将页脚推到底部。如果从实际示例中删除 flex 属性，您将看到页脚如何向上移动以直接位于内容下方。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox is particularly useful when it comes to styling form controls. Forms have lots of markup and lots of small elements that we typically want to align with each other. A common pattern is to have an <input> element paired with a <button>, perhaps for a search form or where you simply want your visitor to enter an email address.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox在样式化表单控件时特别有用。表单具有很多标记和许多我们通常希望彼此对齐的小元素。一种常见的模式是将 <input> 元素与 <button> 配对，也许用于搜索表单，或者您只是希望访问者输入电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox is very well supported across modern browsers, however there are a few issues that you might run into. In this guide we will look at how well flexbox is supported in browsers, and look at some potential issues, resources and methods for creating workarounds and fallbacks.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox在现代浏览器中得到了很好的支持,但是你可能会遇到一些问题。在本指南中,我们将探讨浏览器对 Flexbox 的支持情况,并探讨一些潜在的问题、资源和方法,以创建变通办法和后备方案。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox justify content
trans-unit.target: Flexbox证明内容

trans-unit.source: Flexbox layout mode
trans-unit.target: Flexbox布局模式

trans-unit.source: Flexbox makes this type of layout easy to achieve. I have contained my <button> and <input> field in a wrapper which I have given a border and set to display: flex. I then use the flex properties to allow the <input> field to grow, while the button does not grow. This means we have a pair of fields, with the text field growing and shrinking as the available space changes.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox使这种布局易于实现。我将我的 <button> 和 <input> 字段包含在包装器中，该包装器提供了一个边框并设置为 display: flex 。然后，我使用flex属性允许 <input> 字段增长，而按钮不增长。这意味着我们有一对字段，文本字段随着可用空间的变化而增加和缩小。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox order
trans-unit.target: Flexbox订单

trans-unit.source: Flexbox respects the writing mode of the document, therefore if you are working in English and set justify-content to flex-end this will align the items to the end of the flex container. If you are working with flex-direction set to row, this alignment will be in the inline direction.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox的尊重文档的书写模式，所以如果你是在英国工作和一套 justify-content 以 flex-end ，这将对齐项目到柔性容器的结尾。如果您将 flex-direction 设置为 row ，则此对齐方式将为inline方向。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox shrink
trans-unit.target: 挠性箱收缩

trans-unit.source: Flexbox was designed as a single dimensional layout, meaning that it deals with laying out items as a row or as a column — but not both at once. There is however the ability to wrap flex items onto new lines, creating new rows if flex-direction is row and new columns if flex-direction is column. In this guide I will explain how this works, what it is designed for and what situations really require CSS Grid Layout rather than flexbox.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox被设计为一维布局，这意味着它可以将项目布置为一行或一列，但不能同时布置。然而，有包装柔性物品到新的生产线的能力，创造新行，如果 flex-direction 是 row 和新列，如果 flex-direction 是 column 。在本指南中，我将解释它的工作原理，设计目的以及真正需要CSS Grid Layout而不是flexbox的情况。

trans-unit.source: Flexbox was implemented in an experimental way in several web browsers. At the time the method of creating experimental implementations was to use a vendor prefix. The idea of these prefixes was to allow implementations of the spec to be tested and explored by browser engineers and web developers alike without clashing with other implementations. The idea was not to use the experimental implementations in production code. However, prefixes ultimately were used in production code, and changes to the experimental specification caused people to need to update their sites to keep up.
trans-unit.target: Flexbox是以实验性的方式在几个Web浏览器中实现的。当时创建实验性实现的方法是使用供应商前缀。这些前缀的想法是允许浏览器工程师和网络开发者对规范的实现进行测试和探索,而不与其他实现发生冲突。这个想法并不是要在生产代码中使用这些实验性的实现。然而,前缀最终还是被用于生产代码中,而实验性规范的变化导致人们需要更新他们的网站以跟上。

trans-unit.source: Font feature settings
trans-unit.target: 字体功能设置

trans-unit.source: Font features or variants refer to different glyphs or character styles contained within an OpenType font. These include things like ligatures (special glyphs that combine characters like 'fi' or 'ffl'), kerning (adjustments to the spacing between specific letterform pairings), fractions, numeral styles, and a number of others. These are all referred to as OpenType Features, and are made available to use on the web via specific properties and a low-level control property — font-feature-settings. This article provides you with all you need to know about using OpenType font features in CSS.
trans-unit.target: 字体功能或变体是指OpenType字体中包含的不同字形或字符样式。这些包括诸如连字（结合了诸如“ fi”或“ ffl”之类的字符的特殊字形），字距调整（对特定字母形式配对之间的间距进行调整），小数，数字样式以及许多其他东西。这些都称为OpenType功能，并且可以通过特定属性和低级控件属性 font-feature-settings 在Web上使用。本文为您提供了有关在CSS中使用OpenType字体功能所需的全部知识。

trans-unit.source: Font features or variants refer to different glyphs or character styles contained within an OpenType font. These include things like ligatures (special glyphs that combine characters like 'fi' or 'ffl'), kerning (adjustments to the spacing between specific letterform pairings), fractions, numeral styles, and a number of others. These are all referred to as OpenType Features, and are made available to use on the web via specific properties and a low-level control property — font-feature-settings. This article provides you with all you need to know about using OpenType font features in CSS.
trans-unit.target: 字体功能或变体是指OpenType字体中包含的不同字形或字符样式。这些包括诸如连字（结合了诸如“ fi”或“ ffl”之类的字符的特殊字形），字距调整（对特定字母形式配对之间的间距进行调整），小数，数字样式以及许多其他东西。这些都称为OpenType功能，并且可以通过特定属性和低级控件属性 font-feature-settings 在Web上使用。本文为您提供了有关在CSS中使用OpenType字体功能所需的全部知识。

trans-unit.target: 字体相关长度

trans-unit.source: Font-relative lengths define the <length> value in terms of the size of a particular character or font attribute in the font currently in effect in an element or its parent.
trans-unit.target: 字体相对长度根据元素或其父级中当前有效的字体中特定字符或字体属性的大小来定义 <length> 值。

trans-unit.source: Fonts
trans-unit.target: Fonts

trans-unit.source: Fonts can supply a number of different alternatives for various glyphs, such as different styles of lower case 'a' or more or less elaborate swashes in a script typeface. This property can activate an entire set of alternates or just a specific one, depending on the values supplied.The example below is showing several different aspects of working with alternate characters. Fonts with alternate glyphs can make them available across the board or individually in separate stylistic sets, or even individual characters. In this example you can see two different typefaces, and the introduction of the @font-feature-values at-rule. This is used to define shortcuts or named options that can be defined per font family. This way you can create a named option that applies to only a single font, or one that is shared and can be applied more generally
trans-unit.target: 字体可以为各种字形提供许多不同的替代方案，例如不同样式的小写字母“ a”或脚本字体中或多或少的精心设计的斜体。此属性可以激活整个替代字符集或仅激活一个特定替代字符集，具体取决于提供的值。下面的示例显示了处理替代字符的几个不同方面。具有备用字形的字体可以使它们在整个板上可用，也可以在单独的样式集中甚至在单个字符上使用。在此示例中，您可以看到两种不同的字体，以及 @font-feature-values 的介绍。规则。这用于定义可以按字体系列定义的快捷方式或命名选项。这样，您可以创建仅适用于单个字体或共享且可以更广泛应用的命名选项。

trans-unit.source: Fonts sometimes include special glyphs for various caseless characters (such as punctuation marks) to better match the capitalized characters around them. However, small capital glyphs are never synthesized for caseless characters.
trans-unit.target: 字体有时会为各种无大小写字符(如标点符号)加入特殊的字形,以便更好地匹配周围的大写字符。但是,小写字母的字形从来没有为无大小写字符合成过。

trans-unit.source: For XUL elements, the computed size of the element is always zero, regardless of other styles that would normally affect the size, although margins still take effect.
trans-unit.target: 对于XUL元素，元素的计算大小始终为零，无论其他通常会影响大小的样式如何，尽管边距仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: For <table> rows, columns, column groups, and row groups, the row(s) or column(s) are hidden and the space they would have occupied is removed (as if display: none were applied to the column/row of the table). However, the size of other rows and columns is still calculated as though the cells in the collapsed row(s) or column(s) are present. This value allows for the fast removal of a row or column from a table without forcing the recalculation of widths and heights for the entire table.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <table> 行，列，列组和行组，将隐藏行或列，并删除它们将要占用的空间（就像 display: none 其应用于列的行）。桌子）。但是，仍然会计算其他行和列的大小，就好像存在折叠的行或列中的单元格一样。此值允许从表中快速删除行或列，而无需强制重新计算整个表的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: For inherited properties, this reinforces the default behavior, and is only needed to override another rule. For non-inherited properties, this specifies a behavior that typically makes relatively little sense and you may consider using initial instead, or unset on the all property.
trans-unit.target: 对于继承的属性，这将增强默认行为，并且仅在覆盖另一个规则时才需要。对于非继承属性，这指定的行为通常意义不大，您可以考虑使用 initial 代替，或者在 all 属性上未 unset 。

trans-unit.source: For inherited properties, the initial value is used on the root element only, as long as no specified value is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 对于继承的属性，只要不提供指定值，则仅在根元素上使用初始值。

trans-unit.source: For non-inherited properties, the initial value is used on all elements, as long as no specified value is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 对于非继承属性，只要不提供任何指定值，就会在所有元素上使用初始值。

trans-unit.source: For align-content to work you need more height in your flex container than is required to display the items. It then works on all the items as a set, and dictates what happens with that free space, and the alignment of the entire set of items within it.
trans-unit.target: 为了 align-content 起作用，您在flex容器中需要的高度要比显示项目所需的高度高。然后，它将所有项目作为一个集合进行处理，并指示该可用空间会发生什么情况，以及其中的整个项目集合的对齐方式。

trans-unit.target: 对于英语,Firefox使用一个全美字典

trans-unit.source: For English, Safari uses different en-GB and en-US dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 在英语方面,Safari使用不同的英英和英美字典。

trans-unit.source: For Internet Explorer versions 5.5 through 7, the rect() function uses spaces (instead of commas) to separate parameters. For Internet Explorer 8 and later versions, only the standard comma-separated syntax is supported.
trans-unit.target: 对于5.5到7的Internet Explorer版本， rect() 函数使用空格（而不是逗号）来分隔参数。对于Internet Explorer 8和更高版本，仅支持标准的逗号分隔语法。

trans-unit.source: For TrueType or OpenType variable fonts, the "wght" variation is used to implement varying widths.
trans-unit.target: 对于TrueType或OpenType可变字体,"wght "变体用于实现不同的宽度。

trans-unit.source: For TrueType or OpenType variable fonts, the "slnt" variation is used to implement varying slant angles for oblique, and the "ital" variation with a value of 1 is used to implement italic values. See font-variation-settings.
trans-unit.target: 对于TrueType或OpenType可变字体， "slnt" 变体用于实现倾斜的倾斜角度，而值为1 的 "ital" 变体用于实现斜体值。参见 font-variation-settings 。

trans-unit.source: For a UA/device where the orientation is changed upon tilting the device, an author can use this descriptor to inhibit the orientation change.
trans-unit.target: 对于在倾斜设备时改变方向的UA/设备,作者可以使用这个描述符来抑制方向变化。

trans-unit.source: For a beginner-level introduction to the syntax of CSS selectors, please see this tutorial. Be aware that any CSS syntax error in a rule definition invalidates the entire rule. Invalid rules are ignored by the browser. Note that CSS rule definitions are entirely (ASCII) text-based, whereas DOM-CSS / CSSOM (the rule management system) is object-based.
trans-unit.target: 有关CSS选择器语法的初学者介绍，请参见本教程。请注意，规则定义中的任何CSS语法错误都会使整个规则无效。无效的规则将被浏览器忽略。请注意，CSS规则定义完全基于（ASCII）文本，而DOM-CSS / CSSOM（规则管理系统）则基于对象。

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of media query syntax, please see Using media queries.
trans-unit.target: 有关媒体查询语法的讨论，请参阅使用媒体查询。

trans-unit.source: For a page containing iframes, objects, or external SVG, both the containing pages and each included file has their own unique window object. Only the top-level window has a visual viewport that may be distinct from the layout viewport. For included documents, the visual viewport and layout viewport are the same.
trans-unit.target: 对于包含iframe、对象或外部SVG的页面,包含的页面和每个包含的文件都有自己独特的窗口对象。只有顶层窗口有一个可视视口,它可能与布局视口不同。对于包含的文件,可视视口和布局视口是相同的。

trans-unit.source: For a particular font family, authors can download various font faces which correspond to the different styles of the same font family, and then use the font-style descriptor to explicitly specify the font face's style. The values for the CSS descriptor is same as that of its corresponding font property.
trans-unit.target: 对于特定的字体系列，作者可以下载与同一字体系列的不同样式相对应的各种字体，然后使用 font-style 描述符显式指定字体的样式。CSS描述符的值与其对应的font属性的值相同。

trans-unit.target: 对于加法系统,范围是0到正无穷大。

trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他情况，指定 auto 与指定 speak-as: numbers 具有相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: For an image with an intrinsic ratio, exactly one size matches the cover/fit criteria alone. But if there is no intrinsic ratio specified, cover/fit isn't sufficient, so the large/small constraints choose the resulting size.
trans-unit.target: 对于具有固有比率的图像，仅一种尺寸仅与 cover /适合标准匹配。但是，如果未指定内在比率，则 cover / fit不够，因此，大/小约束选择了结果大小。

trans-unit.source: For an overview of using color in HTML, see Applying color to HTML elements using CSS.
trans-unit.target: 有关在HTML中使用颜色的概述，请参见使用CSS将颜色应用于HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: For certain XUL elements and pseudo-elements that use an image from the list-style-image property, this property specifies a region of the image that is used in place of the whole image. This allows elements to use different pieces of the same image to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些使用 list-style-image 属性中的图像的XUL元素和伪元素，此属性指定用于代替整个图像的图像区域。这允许元素使用同一图像的不同部分来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For cyclic, numeric, and fixed systems, the range is negative infinity to positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: 对于循环系统、数字系统和固定系统,范围是负无穷到正无穷。

trans-unit.source: For each pixel among the layers to which it is applied, a blend mode takes the colors of the foreground and the background, perfoms a calculation on them, and returns a new color value.
trans-unit.target: 对于应用到的图层中的每个像素,混合模式采用前景和背景的颜色,对它们进行计算,并返回一个新的颜色值。

trans-unit.source: For elements rendered as a single box, this property specifies the mask positioning area. In other words, this property specifies the origin position of an image specified by the mask-image CSS property. For elements rendered as multiple boxes, such as inline boxes on several lines or boxes on several pages, it specifies which boxes box-decoration-break operates upon to determine the mask positioning area.
trans-unit.target: 对于渲染为单个框的元素，此属性指定蒙版定位区域。换句话说，此属性指定由 mask-image CSS属性指定的图像的原点位置。对于呈现为多个框的元素，例如多行上的内联框或几页上的框，它指定对 box-decoration-break 操作哪个框来确定遮罩定位区域。

trans-unit.source: For elements that do not have a baseline, the bottom margin edge is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 对于没有基线的元素,使用底边距边缘代替。

trans-unit.source: For example, in Flex Layout items are aligned with flex-start initially. Working in a horizontal top to bottom writing mode such as English, with flex-direction as row the items start on the far left and any available space after displaying the items is placed after the items.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在“ Flex布局”中，项目最初与 flex-start 对齐。在水平的从上到下书写模式（例如英语）中，以 flex-direction 作为 row ，项目从最左边开始，并且在显示项目之后将所有可用空间放置在项目之后。

trans-unit.source: For example, small caps can be set several ways, but if you want to ensure that no matter what the underlying capitalization is that you end up with everything in small caps, it requires 2 settings with font-feature-settings versus a single property value using font-variant-caps.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用几种方法来设置小写字母，但是如果要确保无论大写字母的大小写都以小写字母结尾，它都需要2个带有 font-feature-settings 设置和单个属性值的设置使用 font-variant-caps 。

trans-unit.source: For example, small text sizes are often rendered with thicker strokes and larger serifs, whereas larger text is often rendered more delicately with more contrast between thicker and thinner strokes.
trans-unit.target: 例如,小尺寸的文字往往用较粗的笔画和较大的衬线来呈现,而大尺寸的文字往往用较粗和较细的笔画对比来呈现,更加细腻。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the font-size of the body of the page is set to 16px. If the font-size you want is 12px, then you should specify 0.75em (because 12/16 = 0.75). Similarly, if you want a font size of 10px, then specify 0.625em (10/16 = 0.625); for 22px, specify 1.375em (22/16).
trans-unit.target: 例如,假设页面正文的字体大小被设置为16px,那么就应该指定0.75em(因为12/16=0.75)。如果你想要的字体大小是12px,那么你应该指定0.75em(因为12/16=0.75)。同理,如果你想要的字体大小是10px,那么就指定0.625em(10/16=0.625);对于22px,就指定1.375em(22/16)。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a mouse event occurs, the position of the mouse as specified in the event's offsetX and offsetY properties are given relative to the top-left corner of the node to which the event has been delivered. trans-unit.source: For example, when working in CSS Grid Layout, if you are working in English and set justify-content to start this will move the items in the inline dimension to the start, which will be the left as sentences in English start on the left. If you were using Arabic, a right to left language, then the same value of start would result in the items moving to the right, as sentences in Arabic start on the right-hand side of the page.

trans-unit.source: For extends systems, the range is whatever auto would produce for the extended system; if extending a complex predefined style (§7 Complex Predefined Counter Styles), the range is the style’s defined range.
trans-unit.target: 对于扩展系统，范围是自动为扩展系统产生的范围。如果扩展复杂的预定义样式（第7章“复杂的预定义计数器样式”），则范围是样式的定义范围。

trans-unit.source: For flex items, the keyword behaves as stretch.
trans-unit.target: 对于弹性项目，关键字的行为与 stretch 。

trans-unit.source: For floated elements, an exclusion is created; for all other elements, an exclusion is not created.
trans-unit.target: 对于浮动元素,会创建一个排除项;对于所有其他元素,不会创建排除项。

trans-unit.source: For font-relative units that are root-based (such as rem), the font size is relative to the size of the font used by the <html> (root) element.
trans-unit.target: 对于基于根的相对字体单位（例如 rem ），字体大小是相对于 <html> （根）元素所使用的字体大小的。

trans-unit.source: For grid items, this keyword leads to a behavior similar to the one of stretch, except for boxes with an aspect ratio or an intrinsic sizes where it behaves like start.
trans-unit.target: 对于网格项目，此关键字的行为类似于 stretch 的行为，除了具有长宽比或固有尺寸的框（其行为类似于 start )。

trans-unit.source: For high-dpi devices, inches (in), centimeters (cm), and millimeters (mm) are the same as their physical counterparts. Therefore, the px unit is defined relative to them (1/96 of 1 inch).
trans-unit.target: 对于高DPI装置，英寸（ in ），厘米（ cm ），并毫米（ mm ）是相同的物理对应物。因此，相对于它们定义了 px 单位（1/96 / 1英寸）。

trans-unit.source: For in-flow boxes contained by this box, block-axis margins adjacent to the box's edges are truncated to zero.
trans-unit.target: 对于该框所包含的流线型框,与框的边缘相邻的块轴边距被截断为零。

trans-unit.source: For inline elements this creates an override. For block container elements this creates an override for inline-level descendants not within another block container element. This means that inside the element, reordering is strictly in sequence according to the direction property; the implicit part of the bidirectional algorithm is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 对于内联元素，这将创建替代。对于块容器元素，这将为不在另一个块容器元素内的内联级别后代创建替代。这意味着在元素内部，严格按照 direction 属性按顺序进行重新排序；双向算法的隐式部分将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: For inspiration see the Layout Labs from Jen Simmons, she has been creating layouts based on a range of sources.
trans-unit.target: 要获得灵感，请参阅Jen Simmons的Layout Labs，她一直在根据各种资源创建布局。

trans-unit.source: For instance, if 2, then no more than 2 successive lines may end with a hyphenated word. If 0 then no lines may end with a hyphenated word. (Hyphenation is effectively disabled.)
trans-unit.target: 例如,如果是2,则不得有超过2行连续的连字符结束。如果是0,那么任何行都不能以连字符结束。(连字符实际上是被禁止的。)

trans-unit.source: For items that are not children of a flex container, this value is treated like end.
trans-unit.target: 对于不是flex容器的子项的项目，此值被视为 end 。

trans-unit.source: For items that are not children of a flex container, this value is treated like start.
trans-unit.target: 对于不是flex容器的子项的项目，此值被视为 start 。

trans-unit.source: For low-dpi devices, the unit px represents the physical reference pixel; other units are defined relative to it. Thus, 1in is defined as 96px, which equals 72pt. The consequence of this definition is that on such devices, dimensions described in inches (in), centimeters (cm), or millimeters (mm) doesn't necessary match the size of the physical unit with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 对于低dpi的设备，单位 px 代表物理参考像素；相对于它定义了其他单位。因此， 1in 定义为 96px ，等于 72pt 。此定义的结果是，在此类设备上，以英寸（ in ），厘米（ cm ）或毫米（ mm ）为单位描述的尺寸不一定与具有相同名称的物理单元的尺寸相匹配。

trans-unit.source: For many people the first reason they start to look at flexbox is because of the ability to properly align flex items inside a flex container. Flexbox provides access to properties that allow the alignment of items on their cross axis and justification of items on the main axis.

trans-unit.source: For many use cases, turning the block container into a flex item will give you the alignment capability that you are looking for. trans-unit.source: Fragmentation occurs when an inline box wraps onto multiple lines. It also occurs when a block spans more than one column inside a column layout container, or spans a page break when printed. Each piece of the rendering for the element is called a fragment.

trans-unit.source:
From CSS Level 1
The definition of 'text-transform' in that specification., extends letters to non-latin bi-cameral scripts
trans-unit.target:
从CSS级别1开始
，在该规范中对“文本转换”的定义。，将字母扩展到非拉丁双子级脚本

trans-unit.source:
From CSS Level 2 (Revision 1)
The definition of 'text-transform' in that specification., extends letters to any Unicode character in the Number or Letter general category. Modifies the behavior of capitalize to apply to the first letter of the word, ignoring initial punctuations or symbols. Adds the full-width keyword to mix smoothly ideographic characters and alphabetical characters.
trans-unit.target:
从CSS Level 2（修订1）开始
，在该规范中对“文本转换”的定义。，将字母扩展到“数字”或“字母”常规类别中的任何Unicode字符。修改 capitalize 的行为以应用于单词的第一个字母，而忽略初始标点或符号。添加 full-width 关键字以平滑混合表意字符和字母字符。

trans-unit.source: From CSS2 Revision 1, the property has been extended to support multiple backgrounds and any <image> CSS data type.
trans-unit.target: 从CSS2修订版1开始，该属性已扩展为支持多个背景和任何 <image> CSS数据类型。

trans-unit.source: From Firefox 1 to Firefox 3, ch did not work with border-width and outline-width CSS properties.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 1到Firefox 3， ch 不适用于 border-width 和 outline-width CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: From Firefox 1 to Firefox 3, ch was the width of the M character.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 1到Firefox 3， ch 是M字符的宽度。

trans-unit.source: From Firefox 10 to Firefox 16 (inclusive), the isolate keyword could be used together with bidi-override, which was the syntax from a previous version of the specification. From Firefox 17, only one value is allowed. Use isolate-override instead the previous isolate bidi-override.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 10到Firefox 16（包括Firefox）， isolate 关键字可以与 bidi-override 结合使用，bidi-override是该规范先前版本的语法。在Firefox 17中，仅允许使用一个值。使用 isolate-override 代替以前的 isolate bidi-override 。

trans-unit.source: From Firefox 10, the default color space when handling masks is sRGB. Previously, the default and only supported color space was linear RGB. This changes the appearance of mask effects, but brings Firefox into compliance with the second edition of the SVG 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 10开始,处理遮罩时的默认色彩空间是sRGB。此前,默认且唯一支持的色彩空间是线性RGB。这改变了遮罩效果的外观,但使Firefox符合第二版SVG 1.1规范。

trans-unit.source: From Firefox 29 until Firefox 31, this feature was implemented by the var-variablename syntax.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 29到Firefox 31，此功能由 var-variablename 语法实现。

trans-unit.source: From Firefox 4 to Firefox 14 (inclusive), Firefox supported an older, slightly different syntax. See OpenType Font Feature support in Firefox 4.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 4到Firefox 14（包括Firefox），Firefox支持较旧的语法稍有不同。请参阅Firefox 4中的OpenType字体功能支持。

trans-unit.source: From Firefox 4, the blur radius is capped at 300 for performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 4开始,出于性能考虑,模糊半径上限为300。

trans-unit.source: From Firefox 48 until Firefox 49, SVGs without viewport are displayed the same as SVGs with viewport, but if the slices are not exactly 50%, they are incorrectly stretched (bug 1264809).
trans-unit.target: 从Firefox 48到Firefox 49，无视口的SVG的显示与有视口的SVG相同，但是如果切片的比例不完全是50％，则会错误地拉伸它们（错误1264809）。

trans-unit.source: From Internet Explorer 5.5 to 7, word-wrap: break-word; can be used for line breaks in pre elements.
trans-unit.target: 从Internet Explorer 5.5到7， word-wrap: break-word; 可用于 pre 元素中的换行符。

trans-unit.source: From Internet Explorer 5.5 to IE 7 (inclusive), Internet Explorer supported an invalid syntax where the character encoding is not between single or double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 从Internet Explorer 5.5到IE 7(含),Internet Explorer支持无效的语法,即字符编码不在单引号或双引号之间。

trans-unit.source: From Opera 15 to Opera 49 (exclusive), the text-transform property does not work on ::first-line or :first-line pseudo-elements. See Chromium bug 129669.
trans-unit.target: 从Opera 15到Opera 49（不包括）， text-transform 属性不适用于 ::first-line 或 :first-line 伪元素。参见Chromium bug 129669。

trans-unit.source: From one to four values that define the 2D position of the element. Relative or absolute offsets can be used.
trans-unit.target: 从1到4个值定义元素的2D位置。可以使用相对或绝对偏移量。

trans-unit.source: From the specification we know that we need to ensure our document maintains the logical order of our content. How should we approach our development to make sure that we maintain accessibility for the different users and the ways that they interact with our pages?
trans-unit.target: 从规范中我们知道,我们需要确保我们的文档保持内容的逻辑顺序。我们应该如何进行开发,以确保我们为不同的用户以及他们与我们的页面互动的方式保持无障碍性?

trans-unit.source: From version 3 to 4.3, there is a serious bug where text-rendering: optimizeLegibility causes custom web fonts to not render. This was fixed in version 4.4.
trans-unit.target: 从版本3到4.3，存在一个严重的 text-rendering: optimizeLegibility 错误：optimizeLegibility导致自定义Web字体无法渲染。在版本4.4中已修复此问题。

trans-unit.source: From version 4 to 6, Internet Explorer enlarges an element with overflow: visible (default value) to fit the content inside it. height and width behave like min-height and min-width, respectively.

trans-unit.source: From version 8, Chrome added support for gradient values. Initially, Chrome supported only -webkit- prefixed values for gradients (such as -webkit-linear-gradient()). Later, support for unprefixed values was added.

trans-unit.source: Gecko allowed none as a value of the system and fallback descriptors of @counter-style, which as per spec should result in an invalid at-rule. Firefox's new parallel CSS engine (also known as Quantum CSS or Stylo, released in Firefox 57) fixed this (bug 1377414).
trans-unit.target: Gecko不允许 none 值作为 system 的值，并且 @counter-style fallback 描述符不符合规范，这将导致无效规则。 Firefox的新并行CSS引擎（也称为Quantum CSS或Stylo，在Firefox 57中发布）修复了此问题（错误1377414）。

trans-unit.source: Gecko defaults
trans-unit.target: Gecko默认

trans-unit.source: Gecko has a bug meaning that background-position can't be transitioned between two values containing different numbers of <position> values, for example background-position: 10px 10px; and background-position: 20px 20px, 30px 30px; (see bug 1390446). Firefox's new parallel CSS engine (also known as Quantum CSS or Stylo, planned for release in Firefox 57) fixes this.
trans-unit.target: Gecko有一个错误，意味着 background-position 不能在包含不同数量 <position> 值的两个值之间 transitioned ，例如 background-position: 10px 10px; 和 background-position: 20px 20px, 30px 30px; （请参见错误1390446）。 Firefox的新并行CSS引擎（也称为Quantum CSS或Stylo，计划在Firefox 57中发布）修复了此问题。

trans-unit.source: Gecko has a bug whereby transitions will not work when transitioning from a text-shadow with a color specified to a text-shadow without a color specified (bug 726550). This has been fixed in Firefox's new parallel CSS engine (also known as Quantum CSS or Stylo, planned for release in Firefox 57).
trans-unit.target: 壁虎具有由此一个错误 transition 旨意不工作从过渡时 text-shadow 与指定的彩色 text-shadow 没有颜色指定（错误726550）。Firefox的新并行CSS引擎（也称为Quantum CSS或Stylo，计划在Firefox 57中发布）已解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: Gecko has a bug whereby when you animate an offscreen element onscreen but specify a delay, Gecko does not repaint on some platforms, e.g. Windows (bug 1383239). This has been fixed in Firefox's new parallel CSS engine (also known as Quantum CSS or Stylo, planned for release in Firefox 57).
trans-unit.target: Gecko有一个错误，当您在屏幕上为屏幕外元素设置动画但指定延迟时，Gecko不会在某些平台上重绘，例如Windows（错误1383239）。Firefox的新并行CSS引擎（也称为Quantum CSS或Stylo，计划在Firefox 57中发布）已解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: Gecko used to have a long-standing bug whereby radial gradients like radial-gradient(circle gold,red) would work, even though they shouldn't because of the missing comma between circle and gold. Also, calc() expressions were rejected — causing the value to be invalid — when used as the radius component of a radial-gradient() function (bug 1376019). Firefox's new parallel CSS engine (also known as Quantum CSS or Stylo, released in Firefox 57) fixed these bugs.
trans-unit.target: Gecko曾经有一个长期存在的错误，即使由于 circle 和 gold 之间缺少逗号而不应该这样做，如 radial-gradient(circle gold,red) 也可以工作。同样，当用作 radial-gradient() 函数的半径分量时， calc() 表达式也被拒绝-导致该值无效（错误1376019）。 Firefox的新并行CSS引擎（也称为Quantum CSS或Stylo，在Firefox 57中发布）修复了这些错误。

trans-unit.source: Gecko, on the other hand, sets a left padding of 40 pixels for the <ul> element, so given the exact same styles as were used to produce Figure 5, loading the example into a Gecko-based browser gives us Figure 6.

trans-unit.source: Generally, when you write the above media query, the styles are applied if the viewport, generally the browser window is between 400px and 500px, inclusive. The width media query in the SVG is based on the element in which the SVG is contained — the <img> if the source is an SVG file, the SVG itself if the SVG is included directly into the HTML, or the parent if the parent element has a width assigned and — not the viewport’s width. With the above media query being in our SVG file, the CSS is applied if the SVG container is between 400 and 500px.
trans-unit.target: 通常，当您编写上述媒体查询时，如果视口（通常是浏览器窗口）在400px至500px（含）之间，则会应用样式。SVG中的宽度媒体查询基于包含SVG的元素-如果<img>如果源是SVG文件，则为<img>；如果SVG直接包含在HTML中，则为SVG本身；如果是父级，则为父级元素具有指定的宽度，而不是视口的宽度。在我们的SVG文件中包含上述媒体查询后，如果SVG容器在400至500px之间，则会应用CSS。

The specification defines what happens if you use other layout methods on an element which then becomes a flex item.

trans-unit.source: Given that interoperable support for display: contents is limited and we do not yet have subgrids, there is a definite temptation when developing a site using CSS Grid Layout to flatten out the markup, to remove semantic elements in order to make it simpler to create a layout. An example would be where some content was semantically marked up as a list but you decide to use a set of <div> elements instead as then you can have the element to be a direct child of a container set to display: grid. Be aware of this temptation and find ways to develop your design without stripping out the markup. Starting out with a well-structured document is a very good way to avoid the problem, as you will be aware that you are removing semantic elements in order to make the layout work if you actually have to go into the document and do so!
trans-unit.target: 鉴于对 display: contents 可互操作性支持有限，并且我们还没有子网格，因此在使用CSS Grid Layout展平标记，删除语义元素以使其创建起来更简单的网站开发站点时，存在一定的诱惑。布局。一个示例是将某些内容在语义上标记为列表，但您决定使用一组 <div> 元素代替，因为这样您就可以将该元素设置为要 display: grid 的容器的直接子代：grid。请注意这种诱惑，并找到开发设计而不删除标记的方法。从结构良好的文档开始是避免该问题的一种很好的方法，因为您将意识到，如果实际上必须进入文档，您将删除语义元素以使布局正常工作！

trans-unit.source: Given that these features take a bit of work to discover and use, it may seem a fair question to ask why one would bother to use them. The answer lies in the specific features that will make a site more useful, readable, and polished:
trans-unit.target: 考虑到这些功能需要花点功夫去发现和使用,问为什么要使用这些功能似乎是个很公平的问题。答案就在于那些能让网站更有用、更可读、更精致的具体功能。

trans-unit.source: Given that we have this ability to position create lines from named areas and areas from named lines it is worth taking a little bit of time to plan your naming strategy when starting out creating your grid layout. By selecting names that will make sense to you and your team you will help everyone to use the layouts you create more easily.
trans-unit.target: 鉴于我们有这种能力来定位从命名的区域创建线条和从命名的线条创建区域,当开始创建网格布局时,值得花一点时间来计划你的命名策略。通过选择对您和您的团队有意义的名称,您将帮助每个人更容易地使用您创建的布局。

trans-unit.source: Given the flexibility of SVG images, there's a lot to keep in mind when using them as background images with the background-image property, and even more to keep in mind when also scaling them using the background-size property. This article describes how scaling of SVG images is handled when using these properties.

trans-unit.source: Grade may become one of the more common custom axes as it has a known history in typeface design. The practice of designing different grades of a typeface was often done in reaction to intended use and printing technique. The term 'grade' refers to the relative weight or density of the typeface design, but differs from traditional 'weight' in that the physical space the text occupies does not change, so changing the text grade doesn't change the overall layout of the text or elements around it. This makes grade a useful axis of variation as it can be varied or animated without causing reflow of the text itself.
trans-unit.target: 等级可能会成为更常见的定制轴之一,因为它在字体设计中有着众所周知的历史。设计不同等级的字体的做法通常是根据预期的用途和印刷技术来进行的。术语 "等级 "指的是字体设计的相对重量或密度,但与传统的 "重量 "不同的是,文字所占的物理空间不会改变,因此改变文字等级不会改变文字或其周围元素的整体布局。这使得等级成为一个有用的变化轴,因为它可以被改变或动画化,而不会导致文本本身的回流。

trans-unit.source: Gradients are limited to background-image, border-image, and mask-image.
trans-unit.target: 渐变仅限于 background-image ， border-image 和 mask-image 。

trans-unit.source: Gradients can be used anywhere you would use an <image>, such as in backgrounds. Because gradients are dynamically generated, they can negate the need for the raster image files that traditionally were used to achieve similar effects. In addition, because gradients are generated by the browser, they look better than raster images when zoomed in, and can be resized on the fly.
trans-unit.target: 可以在使用 <image> 的任何地方（例如在背景中）使用渐变。由于渐变是动态生成的，因此可以消除对传统上用来实现类似效果的栅格图像文件的需求。另外，由于渐变是由浏览器生成的，因此放大时它们看起来比栅格图像更好，并且可以即时调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Gradients support transparency, so you can stack multiple backgrounds to achieve some pretty fancy effects. The backgrounds are stacked from top to bottom, with the first specified being on top.
trans-unit.target: Gradients支持透明,所以你可以堆叠多个背景来实现一些漂亮的花哨效果。背景从上到下叠加,第一个指定的背景在上面。

trans-unit.source: Grid contains alignment features so that we can control how the items align once placed into a grid area, and how the entire grid is aligned.
trans-unit.target: 网格包含了对齐功能,这样我们就可以控制物品放入网格区域后如何对齐,以及整个网格如何对齐。

trans-unit.source: Grid definition shorthands
trans-unit.target: 网格定义速记

trans-unit.source: Grid gap shorthands
trans-unit.target: 网格间隙速记

trans-unit.source: Grid has a solution for this with the minmax() function. In this next example I am using minmax() in the value of grid-auto-rows. This means automatically created rows will be a minimum of 100 pixels tall, and a maximum of auto. Using auto means that the size will look at the content size and will stretch to give space for the tallest item in a cell, in this row.
trans-unit.target: Grid使用 minmax() 函数为此提供了一个解决方案。在下一个示例中，我在 grid-auto-rows 的值中使用 minmax() 。这意味着自动创建的行的最小高度为100像素，最大为 auto 。使用 auto 表示该尺寸将查看内容的尺寸，并会拉伸以为该行中单元格中最高的项目提供空间。

trans-unit.source: Grid interacts with absolutely positioned elements, which can be useful if you want to position an item inside a grid or grid area. The specification defines the behavior when a grid container is a containing block and a parent of the absolutely positioned item.
trans-unit.target: 网格与绝对定位的元素交互,如果你想在网格或网格区域内定位一个项目,这很有用。该规范定义了当一个网格容器是包含块和绝对定位项的父块时的行为。

trans-unit.source: Grid is a powerful specification and when combined with other parts of CSS such as flexbox, can help you to create layouts that were previously impossible to build in CSS. It all starts by creating a grid in your grid container.
trans-unit.target: Grid是一个功能强大的规范，当与CSS的其他部分（例如flexbox）结合使用时，可以帮助您创建以前无法在CSS中构建的布局。这一切都始于在网格容器中创建网格。

trans-unit.source: Grid items can occupy the same cell. If we return to our example with items positioned by line number, we can change this to make two items overlap.
trans-unit.target: 网格项可以占据同一个单元格。如果我们回到按行号定位的项目的例子,我们可以改变这一点,使两个项目重叠。

trans-unit.source: Grid layout
trans-unit.target: 网格布局

trans-unit.source: Grid layout gives authors great powers of rearrangement over the document. However, these are not a substitute for correct ordering of the document source. The order property and grid placement do not affect ordering in non-visual media (such as speech). Likewise, rearranging grid items visually does not affect the default traversal order of sequential navigation modes (such as cycling through links, see e.g. tabindex HTML5).
trans-unit.target: 网格布局使作者可以对文档进行重新排列。但是，这些并不能代替文档源的正确排序。订单属性和网格放置不会影响非可视媒体（例如语音）中的订单。同样，在视觉上重新排列网格项不会影响顺序导航模式的默认遍历顺序（例如，通过链接循环，请参见例如tabindex HTML5）。

trans-unit.source: Grid lines
trans-unit.target: 网线

trans-unit.source: Grid places items that have not been given a grid position in what is described in the specification as “order modified document order”. This means that if you have used the order property at all, the items will be placed by that order, not their DOM order. Otherwise they will stay by default in the order that they are entered in the document source.
trans-unit.target: 网格将未赋予网格位置的项目放置在规范中称为“订单修改文档订单”的位置。这意味着，如果您完全使用了 order 属性，则将按该顺序放置商品，而不是按其DOM顺序放置商品。否则，默认情况下，它们将按照在文档源中输入的顺序保留。

trans-unit.source: Grid prefixes are disabled by default because some properties can’t be prefixed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，网格前缀是禁用的，因为某些属性无法添加前缀。

trans-unit.source: Grid row
trans-unit.target: 网格行

trans-unit.source: Grid template areas
trans-unit.target: 网格模板区域

trans-unit.source: Grid works from the layout in. When you use CSS Grid Layout you create a layout and then you place items into it, or you allow the auto-placement rules to place the items into the grid cells according to that strict grid. It is possible to create tracks that respond to the size of the content, however, they will also change the entire track.
trans-unit.target: Grid的工作原理是从布局中。当你使用CSS Grid Layout时,你创建了一个布局,然后你将项目放入其中,或者你允许自动放置规则根据该严格的网格将项目放入网格单元中。可以创建响应内容大小的轨道,然而,它们也会改变整个轨道。

trans-unit.source: Grids, logical values and writing modes
trans-unit.target: 网格、逻辑值和书写模式

trans-unit.source: Group must produce at least 1 value
trans-unit.target: 集团必须至少产生1个价值

trans-unit.source: Grouped elements that permit multiple selections may also have multiple defaults, i.e., they may have multiple items initially selected. In this case, all defaults are represented using the :default pseudo-class. For example, you can style the default checkboxes among a group of checkboxes.
trans-unit.target: 允许多个选择的分组元素也可能具有多个默认值，即，它们可能具有多个最初选择的项目。在这种情况下，所有默认值都使用 :default 伪类表示。例如，您可以在一组复选框中设置默认复选框的样式。

trans-unit.source: HTML spec also says that an <input> element can be replaced, because <input> elements of the "image" type are replaced elements similar to <img>. However, other form controls, including other types of <input> elements, are explicitly listed as non-replaced elements (the spec describes their default platform-specific rendering with the term "Widgets").
trans-unit.target: HTML规范还指出，一个 <input> 元件可以被替换，因为 <input> 的元素 "image" 类型被替换类似的元件 <img> 。但是，其他形式的控件（包括其他类型的 <input> 元素）被明确列出为不可替换的元素（规范使用术语“小部件”描述了其默认的特定于平台的呈现）。

trans-unit.source: Having defined these names I then create my layout. This time, instead of placing my items using line numbers specified on the items themselves, I create the whole layout on the grid container.
trans-unit.target: 定义了这些名称之后,我就创建我的布局。这一次,我没有使用项目本身指定的行号来放置我的项目,而是在网格容器上创建整个布局。

trans-unit.source: Having done this, grid will now backfill the gaps, as it moves through the grid it leaves gaps as before, but then if it finds an item that will fit in a previous gap it will pick it up and take it out of DOM order to place it in the gap. As with any other reordering in grid this does not change the logical order. Tab order for example, will still follow the document order. We will take a look at the potential accessibility issues of Grid Layout in a later guide, but you should take care when creating this disconnect between the visual order and display order.
trans-unit.target: 当它在网格中移动时,它会像以前一样留下空隙,但是如果它发现一个项目可以放入以前的空隙中,它就会把它从DOM顺序中拿出来放到空隙中。就像在网格中的任何其他重新排序一样,这不会改变逻辑顺序。例如,Tab顺序仍然会遵循文档顺序。我们将在后面的指南中看看网格布局的潜在可访问性问题,但你在创建这种视觉顺序和显示顺序之间的脱节时应该小心。

trans-unit.source: Having looked at various ways of placing items on our grids and many of the properties used to define grid, this is a good time to take a look at a couple of shorthands that are available for defining the grid and many things about it all in one line of CSS.
trans-unit.target: 看过了在我们的网格上放置项目的各种方法和许多用于定义网格的属性,现在是一个很好的时间来看看几个可用于定义网格的速记,以及许多关于它的事情都在一行CSS中。

trans-unit.source: Helvetica Neue, which is installed by default on macOS, has a single condensed face in addition to the normal face. All values of font-stretch less than 100% select the condensed face, while all other values select the normal face.

trans-unit.source: Here is the above code example running live. Note that there are no icons used, and the check-mark is actually the ::before that has been styled in CSS. Go ahead and get some stuff done.
trans-unit.target: 这是上面的代码示例，实时运行。请注意，没有使用任何图标，并且复选标记实际上是 ::before 在CSS中设置样式之前的:::。继续做一些事情。

trans-unit.source: Here is the result of running the code above:
trans-unit.target: 下面是运行上述代码的结果。

trans-unit.source: Here the dimensions of the element are calculated as: width = border + padding + width of the content, and height = border + padding + height of the content.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，元素的尺寸计算为：width = border + padding +内容的宽度，height = border + padding + content的高度。

trans-unit.source: Here we are saying that the size of the item for the purposes of our space distribution calculation is 0 — all the space is up for grabs and as all of the items have the same flex-grow factor, they each get an equal amount of space distributed. The end result is three equal width, flexible items.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们要说的是，出于空间分配计算的目的，项目的大小为 0 -所有空间都可以争夺，并且所有项目都具有相同的 flex-grow 因子，因此每个项目都获得了相等的空间分散式。最终结果是三个相等宽度的柔性物品。

trans-unit.source: Here we are using the auto margins technique described in Using auto margins for main axis alignment. The items are aligned on the main axis with flex-start as this is the initial behaviour of flexbox, and we are aligning the item on the right by giving it a left margin of auto. You can move the class from one item to another to change where the split happens.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们使用了将自动边距用于主轴对齐中所述的自动边距技术。使用 flex-start 将项目在主轴上对齐，因为这是flexbox的初始行为，我们通过为项目赋予左侧的auto边距来将其在右侧对齐。您可以将班级从一项移至另一项，以更改拆分发生的位置。

trans-unit.source: Here we see HTML that includes two <img> elements, each displaying the MDN logo.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们看到包含两个 <img> 元素的HTML ，每个元素都显示MDN徽标。

trans-unit.source: Here we've set the image src to a data URI containing a simple SVG image; the <rect> inside has been made to take its fill and stroke values from the fill and stroke set on the <img> element by giving them the context-fill/context-stroke keywords in their values, along with a fallback color for the fill (red) which will be used in the case that the SVG is loaded standalone in a top-level window (where it will have no context element to provide context values). Note that if a color is set directly on the SVG, but then the context color is also specified, the context color overrides the direct color.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们将图像 src 设置为包含简单SVG图像的数据URI；通过将 <rect> 内部的值设置为 context-fill / context-stroke 关键字，并为其提供后备颜色，可以使内部的<rect>从 <img> 元素上的 fill 和 stroke 设置中获取其 fill 和 stroke 值。填充（红色），用于在顶层窗口中独立加载SVG的情况下使用（该窗口将没有上下文元素来提供上下文值）。请注意，如果直接在SVG上设置颜色，但同时又指定了上下文颜色，则上下文颜色将覆盖直接颜色。

trans-unit.source: Here you can see the results in action. As you mouse in and around the blue box, watch the values of the mouse's X and Y coordinates change in the various coordinate systems in which you can obtain the values. Note also the effect of scrolling the example horizontally upon the values returned and how the value of clientX doesn't change.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，您可以看到实际的结果。当您在蓝色框内或周围移动鼠标时，请注意在各种坐标系中鼠标X和Y坐标值的变化，您可以从中获得这些值。还要注意在返回的值上水平滚动示例的效果以及 clientX 的值如何保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Here's an example of an inline element using a large border-radius value. The second "iM" has a line-break between the "i" and the "M". For comparison, the first "iM" is without line breaks. Note that if you stack the rendering of the two fragments horizontally next to each other it will result in the non-fragmented rendering.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个使用较大 border-radius 值的内联元素的示例。第二个 "iM" 在 "i" 和 "M" 之间有换行符。为了进行比较，第一个 "iM" 没有换行符。请注意，如果将两个片段的渲染彼此水平地并排放置，将导致非片段化渲染。

trans-unit.target: 调用 play() 函数时，会发生以下情况：

trans-unit.source: Here, the 200px specified in the CSS overrides the 100px width specified in the SVG, per rule 1. Since there's no intrinsic ratio or height provided, auto selects the height of the background area as the height for the rendered image.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，按照规则1，CSS中指定的200px会覆盖SVG中指定的100px宽度。由于没有提供固有比率或高度，因此 auto 会自动选择背景区域的高度作为渲染图像的高度。

trans-unit.source: Here, the 3:4 ratio is preserved while still stretching the image to fill the entire box. That causes the bottom of the image to be clipped away.
trans-unit.target: 在这里,保留了3:4的比例,同时仍然拉伸图像以填满整个方框。这就导致图像的底部被剪掉了。

trans-unit.source: Here, the top property animates using the 0%, 30%, and 100% keyframes, and left animates using the 0%, 68%, and 100% keyframes.
trans-unit.target: 在这里， top 属性使用 0% ， 30% 和 100% 关键帧进行动画处理，而 left 属性使用 0% ， 68% 和 100% 关键帧进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: Here, the dimensions of the element are calculated as: width = width of the content, and height = height of the content. (Borders and padding are not included in the calculation.)
trans-unit.target: 在这里，元素的尺寸计算如下：width =内容的宽度，height =内容的高度。（边界和填充不包括在计算中。）

trans-unit.source: Here, the dotted blue border shows us the edges of the <ul> element's content area. Since we have no padding for the <ul> element, its content wraps snugly around the three list items.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，蓝色虚线框为我们显示了 <ul> 元素内容区域的边缘。由于我们没有 <ul> 元素的填充，因此它的内容紧紧围绕三个列表项。

trans-unit.source: Here, the form itself is established to use 1/6 of the available window width. Then, to ensure that input fields retain an appropriate size, we use calc() again to establish that they should be the width of their container minus 1em. Then, the following HTML makes use of this CSS:
trans-unit.target: 在这里，表单本身被建立为使用可用窗口宽度的1/6。然后，为确保输入字段保留适当的大小，我们再次使用 calc() 来确定它们应为容器宽度减去1em。然后，以下HTML使用此CSS：

trans-unit.source: Here, the form itself, along with the margin, border, and padding, will be 100% of it's parent's width. We declare the input and label to be the lesser of 40% of the form width up to the padding or 400px wide, whichever is smaller. In other words, the widest, or max-width, the label and input will be is 400px. The narrowest they will be is 40% of the form's width, which on a watch is going to be very small.
trans-unit.target: 在这里,表单本身,以及margin、border和padding,将是它的父级宽度的100%,我们声明输入和标签是表单宽度的40%到padding或400px宽,以较小的为准。我们声明输入和标签的宽度为表单宽度的40%,直至padding,或400px宽,以较小者为准。换句话说,标签和输入的最大宽度是400px。它们最窄的宽度是表单宽度的40%,这在手表上是非常小的。

trans-unit.source: Here, the image is sized so that it fills the largest dimension. The 1:1 aspect ratio has been preserved, although with this source image, that can be difficult to see.
trans-unit.target: 在这里,图像的大小使其充满了最大的尺寸。1:1的纵横比被保留了下来,尽管对于这幅源图像来说,这很难看出来。

trans-unit.source: Here, the width is determined using the background area's width per rule 4, while the height is the 140px specified in the CSS.
trans-unit.target: 这里,宽度是根据规则4使用背景区域的宽度确定的,而高度则是CSS中指定的140px。

trans-unit.source: However, certain properties will restrict the output if it goes outside an allowable range. For example, a color component greater than 255 or smaller than 0 will be clipped to the closest allowed value (255 and 0, respectively). Some cubic-bezier() curves exhibit this property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果某些属性超出允许范围，则会限制输出。例如，大于 255 或小于 0 的颜色分量将被裁剪为最接近的允许值（分别为 255 和 0 ）。一些 cubic-bezier() 曲线显示了此属性。

trans-unit.source: However, do not use the following: (See the section on performance below.)
trans-unit.target: 但是，请勿使用以下内容：（请参阅下面的性能部分。）

trans-unit.source: However, for some properties (those where percentages are relative to something that may require layout to determine, such as width, margin-right, text-indent, and top), percentage-specified values turn into percentage-computed values. Additionally, unitless numbers specified on the line-height property become the computed value, as specified. The relative values that remain in the computed value become absolute when the used value is determined.
trans-unit.target: 但是，对于某些属性（那些百分比相对于可能需要布局确定的东西而言，例如 width ， margin-right ， text-indent 和 top ），指定百分比的值将转换为百分比计算的值。此外，在 line-height 属性上指定的无单位数字将成为指定的计算值。当保留在所计算的值的相对值成为绝对用过的值被确定。

trans-unit.source: However, in Flexbox you can change the main axis by setting flex-direction to column. In this case justify-content will align items in the block direction. Therefore it is easiest to think about the main and cross axis when working in Flexbox like so:
trans-unit.target: 但是，在Flexbox中，您可以通过将 flex-direction 设置为 column 来更改主轴。在这种情况下，“ justify-content 将沿块方向对齐项目。因此，像这样在Flexbox中工作时，最容易考虑主轴和横轴：

trans-unit.source: However, in older browsers like IE8-9 that do not support Flexible Box Layout, these are not available. In order to center an element inside its parent, use margin: 0 auto;.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在不支持“灵活框式布局”的较旧的浏览器（如IE8-9）中，这些功能不可用。为了使元素在其父元素内部居中，请使用 margin: 0 auto; 。

trans-unit.source: However, in some situations it is also useful to set the maximum height of the columns explicitly, and then lay out content starting at the first column and creating as many columns as necessary, possibly overflowing to the right. Therefore, if the height is constrained, by setting the CSS height or max-height properties on a multi-column block, each column is allowed to grow to that height and no further before adding new column. This mode is also much more efficient for layout.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在某些情况下，显式设置列的最大高度，然后对内容进行布局也很有用，该内容从第一列开始，并根据需要创建尽可能多的列，可能会向右溢出。因此，如果高度受到限制，则通过在多列块上设置CSS height 或 max-height 属性，允许每一列增长到该高度，并且在添加新列之前不能再增长。此模式的布局效率也更高。

trans-unit.source: However, note that the <percentage> syntax is not yet supported by all browsers: check the Browser compatibility table for details.
trans-unit.target: 但是，请注意，并非所有浏览器都支持 <percentage> 语法：有关详细信息，请查看浏览器兼容性表。

trans-unit.source: However, one major transformation is not linear, and therefore must be special-cased when using this notation: translation. The translation vector (tx, ty) must be expressed separately, as two additional parameters.
trans-unit.target: 但是，一个主要的变换不是线性的，因此在使用这种表示法时必须是特殊情况：平移。翻译向量 (tx, ty) 必须分别表示为两个附加参数。

trans-unit.source: Hyphenation rules are language-specific. In HTML, the language is determined by the lang attribute, and browsers will hyphenate only if this attribute is present and if an appropriate hyphenation dictionary is available. In XML, the xml:lang attribute must be used.
trans-unit.target: 断字规则是特定于语言的。在HTML中，语言是由 lang 属性决定的，浏览器仅在存在该属性且有适当的断字词典可用时才进行断字。在XML中，必须使用 xml:lang 属性。

trans-unit.source: I
trans-unit.target: I

trans-unit.source: I am going to create this layout using the named template areas that we learned about in the guide Grid template areas.
trans-unit.target: 我将使用在网格模板区域指南中了解的命名模板区域来创建此布局。

trans-unit.source: I can add to our earlier example by adding the grid-template-columns property, then defining the size of the column tracks.
trans-unit.target: 我可以通过添加 grid-template-columns 属性，然后定义列轨道的大小，来添加到前面的示例中。

trans-unit.source: I can cause a grid to backfill those gaps by setting grid-auto-flow: dense on the grid container. Take care when doing this however as it does take items away from their logical source order. You should only do this if your items do not have a set order – and be aware of the issues of the tab order following the source and not your reordered display.
trans-unit.target: 我可以通过在网格容器上设置 grid-auto-flow : dense 来使网格回填这些间隙。但是，在执行此操作时要小心，因为它确实会使项目脱离其逻辑源顺序。仅当您的商品没有固定顺序时才应这样做–并且要注意源后面的制表符顺序问题，而不是重新排序的显示。

trans-unit.source: I can now add a final breakpoint to move to a three-column layout.
trans-unit.target: 我现在可以添加最后一个断点,转为三栏布局。

trans-unit.source: I can then place these on the grid using the named lines, and also the span keyword.
trans-unit.target: 然后,我可以使用命名行,也可以使用跨度关键字将这些放在网格上。

trans-unit.source: I can then set up our grid, as for the example 12-column layout above.
trans-unit.target: 然后,我可以设置我们的网格,就像上面的12列布局的例子一样。

trans-unit.source: I can then tidy up the internals of the boxes using a little touch of flexbox. I set the list item to display: flex and the flex-direction to column. I can then use an auto margin on the .cta to push this bar down to the bottom of the box.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我可以使用一点点的flexbox整理盒子的内部结构。我将列表项设置为 display: flex 并将 flex-direction 设置为 column 。然后，我可以在 .cta 上使用自动边距将其向下推到框的底部。

trans-unit.source: I can use shape-margin to move the text away from the shape, giving a margin around the created shape and the text.
trans-unit.target: 我可以使用 shape-margin 将文本移离形状，在创建的形状和文本周围留出边距。

trans-unit.source: I could then place this on my grid layout framework like this.
trans-unit.target: 然后,我可以把这个放在我的网格布局框架上,像这样。

trans-unit.source: I have also set the flex-wrap property to wrap, so that if the space in the container becomes too narrow to maintain the flex basis, items will wrap onto a new row.
trans-unit.target: 我还将 flex-wrap 属性设置为 wrap ，因此，如果容器中的空间变得太窄而无法维持flex基础，则项目将换行到新行。

trans-unit.source: I have created this behaviour in the next live example. You can see how the stretching changes row based on the location of the collapsed item. If you add more content to the second item, it changes row once it gets long enough. That top row then only becomes as tall as a single line of text.
trans-unit.target: 我在接下来的实战示例中创建了这种行为。你可以看到拉伸如何根据折叠项的位置改变行。如果你向第二个项目添加更多内容,一旦它变得足够长,它就会改变行。那最上面的一行就会变得只有一行文字那么高。

trans-unit.source: I have given .box3 position relative and then positioned the sub-item with the offset properties. In this case, the positioning context is the grid area.
trans-unit.target: 我给了 .box3 相对位置，然后用offset属性定位了子项目。在这种情况下，定位上下文是网格区域。

trans-unit.source: I have now created a grid with three 200-pixel-wide column tracks. The child items will be laid out on this grid one in each grid cell.
trans-unit.target: 我现在已经创建了一个有三个200像素宽的列轨的网格。子项将在这个网格上的每个网格单元中布局。

trans-unit.source: I make the .wrapper a grid container.
trans-unit.target: 我将 .wrapper 设置为网格容器。

trans-unit.source: I then enhance the layout using grid. I can turn my <ul> into a grid container with three column tracks. However, the width I have assigned to the list items themselves still applies, and it now makes those items a third of the width of the track:
trans-unit.target: 然后，我使用网格增强布局。我可以将 <ul> 变成具有三个列轨道的网格容器。但是，我分配给列表项本身的宽度仍然适用，现在使这些项的宽度是轨道宽度的三分之一：

trans-unit.source: I use an @supports rule to check for support of display: grid. I then do my grid code on the <ul>, set my width and min-height on the <li> to auto. I also remove the margins and negative margins, and replace the spacing with the grid-gap property. This means I don’t get a final margin on the last row of boxes. The layout now works, even if there is more content in one of the cards, than the others:
trans-unit.target: 我使用 @supports 规则检查对 display: grid 支持。然后，在 <ul> 上执行网格代码，在 <li> 上将宽度和 min-height 设置为 auto 。我还删除了边距和负边距，并用 grid-gap 属性替换了间距。这意味着我在最后一行盒子上没有最终的保证金。现在，即使其中一张卡片中的内容比其他卡片中的内容更多，该布局仍然有效：

trans-unit.source: I’m going to introduce another specification here, that I will be using in my examples: the CSS Writing Modes specification. This spec details how we can use these different writing modes in CSS, not just for the support of languages that have a different writing mode to English, but also for creative purposes. I’ll be using the writing-mode property to make changes to the writing mode applied to our grid, in order to demonstrate how the logical values work. If you want to dig into writing modes further, however, then I would recommend that you read Jen Simmons excellent article on CSS Writing Modes. This goes into more depth on that specification than we will touch upon here.
trans-unit.target: 我将在这里介绍另一个规范，该示例将在示例中使用：CSS Writing Modes规范。该规范详细说明了我们如何在CSS中使用这些不同的书写模式，不仅用于支持与英语具有不同书写模式的语言，还用于创造性目的。我将使用 writing-mode 属性更改应用于网格的书写模式，以演示逻辑值的工作方式。但是，如果您想进一步研究编写模式，那么我建议您阅读Jen Simmons关于CSS Writing Modes的优秀文章。在该规范上，这比我们在此更深入地讨论。

trans-unit.source: I’m using the same grid definitions as above, however this time I am going to place a single item into the named area content.
trans-unit.target: 我使用的网格定义与上述相同，但是这次我将单个项目放入命名区域 content 。

trans-unit.source: Identical to smooth, but with a preference for higher-quality scaling. If system resources are constrained, images with high-quality should be prioritized over those with any other value, when considering which images to degrade the quality of and to what degree.

trans-unit.source: If :-moz-focusring matches, then :focus also matches, but the converse is not always true: it depends on whether the user agent has focus ring drawing enabled and how the element was focused. trans-unit.target: 如果 :-moz-focusring 匹配，则 :focus 也匹配，但是反过来并不总是正确的：这取决于用户代理是否启用了聚焦环绘制以及元素如何聚焦。用户代理是否启用了聚焦环绘制取决于操作系统设置和其他因素，因此该伪类的确切行为将因平台而异。

trans-unit.target: 如果 max < min ，则忽略 max ，并将 minmax(min,max) 视为 min 。最大值 <flex> 设置网格轨迹的弯曲因子；至少无效。

trans-unit.source: If I add align-content to my container, with a value of end, the tracks all move to the end line of the grid container in the block dimension:
trans-unit.target: 如果我将 align-content 添加到我的容器中，其值为 end ，则轨迹将全部移动到块尺寸中的网格容器的终点行：

trans-unit.source: If I now add display:contents to the rules for box1, the box for that item vanishes and the sub-items now become grid items and lay themselves out using the auto-placement rules.
trans-unit.target: 如果我现在将 display: contents 添加到 box1 的规则中，则该项目的框消失，并且子项目现在变为网格项目，并使用自动放置规则进行布局。

trans-unit.source: If I now add the direction property with a value of rtl to the grid container, line 1 becomes the right hand side of the grid, and line -1 on the left.
trans-unit.target: 如果现在将具有 rtl 值的 direction 属性添加到网格容器，则第1行成为网格的右侧，而第-1行成为左侧。

trans-unit.source: If I now change the writing mode of this component to vertical-rl using the writing-mode property, the alignment continues to work in the same way. The inline dimension is now running vertically and the block dimension horizontally. The grid doesn't look the same however, as the width assigned to the container is a horizontal measure, a measure tied to the physical and not the logical or flow relative running of the text.
trans-unit.target: 如果现在我使用 vertical-rl writing-mode 属性将此组件的写入模式更改为vertical-rl，则对齐方式将继续以相同的方式工作。现在，内联尺寸垂直运行，而块尺寸水平运行。但是，网格看起来并不一样，因为分配给容器的宽度是水平度量，是与文本的物理而不是逻辑或流程相对运行相关的度量。

trans-unit.source: If I reset the width to auto, then this will stop the float behavior happening for older browsers. I need to be able to define the width for older browsers, and remove the width for grid supporting browsers. Thanks to CSS Feature Queries I can do this, right in my CSS.
trans-unit.target: 如果将width重置为 auto ，那么这将停止旧版本浏览器的浮动行为。我需要能够为较旧的浏览器定义宽度，并为支持网格的浏览器删除宽度。感谢CSS Feature Queries，我可以在CSS中执行此操作。

trans-unit.target: 如果将 box1 设置为 display: grid 我可以为其指定轨迹定义，它也将成为网格。然后将这些项目放在此新网格上。

trans-unit.source: If I wanted all of my navigation items to have equal width, then I might use flex: auto, which is the shorthand for flex: 1 1 auto — all items grow and shrink from a flex-basis of auto. This would mean that the longer item would have more space.
trans-unit.target: 如果我希望所有导航项目都具有相同的宽度，则可以使用 flex: auto ，它是 flex: 1 1 auto 的简写-所有项目都基于auto的flex伸缩。这意味着较长的物品将具有更多的空间。

trans-unit.source: If a form contains optional <input>s, required inputs should be indicated using the required attribute. trans-unit.target: 如果表单包含可选的 <input> ，则应使用 required 属性指示必需的输入。这将确保在诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助技术的帮助下进行导航的人们将能够理解哪些输入需要有效的内容，以确保成功提交表单。

trans-unit.source: If a given animation time offset is duplicated, the last keyframe in the @keyframes rule for that percentage is used for that frame. There's no cascading within a @keyframes rule if multiple keyframes specify the same percentage values.

trans-unit.source: If a grid item is positioned into a column that is not explicitly sized by grid-template-columns, implicit grid tracks are created to hold it. trans-unit.source: If a grid item is positioned into a row that is not explicitly sized by grid-template-rows, implicit grid tracks are created to hold it. This can happen either by explicitly positioning into a row that is out of range, or by the auto-placement algorithm creating additional rows.

trans-unit.source: If a keyframe rule doesn't specify the start or end states of the animation (that is, 0%/from and 100%/to, browsers will use the element's existing styles for the start/end states. This can be used to animate an element from its initial state and back.

trans-unit.source: If all of your items have the same flex-grow factor then space will be distributed evenly between all of them. If this is the situation that you want then typically you would use 1 as the value, however you could give them all a flex-grow of 88, or 100, or 1.2 if you like — it is a ratio. If the factor is the same for all, and there is positive free space in the flex container then it will be distributed equally to all.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有项目都具有相同的 flex-grow 因子，则空间将在所有项目之间平均分配。如果这是您要那么通常你会使用情况 1 的值，但是你可以给他们全部 flex-grow 的 88 ，或 100 ，或 1.2 ，如果你喜欢-这是一个比值。如果所有因素均相同，并且flex容器中有正的自由空间，则它将平均分配给所有人。

trans-unit.source: If an image doesn't specify either dimensions or an intrinsic ratio, neither rule 2 nor rule 3 apply, so rule 4 takes over: the background image is rendered covering the entire background area. This satisfies the largest-or-smallest constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果一张图像既没有指定尺寸,也没有指定内在比例,规则 2 和规则 3 都不适用,所以规则 4 取而代之:背景图像将覆盖整个背景区域。这就满足了最大或最小的约束。

trans-unit.source: If any of the three concerned values is a forced break value (always, left, right, page, column, or region), it has precedence. If more than one of them are such a break, the one of the element that appears the latest in the flow is taken (i.e., the break-before value has precedence over the break-after value, which itself has precedence over the break-inside value).
trans-unit.target: 如果三个相关值中的任何一个是强制中断值（ always ， left ， right ， page ， column 或 region ），则它具有优先级。如果此类中断中有多个，则采用流中最新出现的元素之一（即， break-before 值优先于 break-after 值，后者本身优先于 break-inside 价值）。

trans-unit.source: If any of the three concerned values is a forced break value (always, left, right, page, column, or region), it has precedence. If more than one of them are such a break, the value of the element that appears the latest in the flow is used. Thus, the break-before value has precedence over the break-after value, which in turn has precedence over the break-inside value.
trans-unit.target: 如果三个相关值中的任何一个是强制中断值（ always ， left ， right ， page ， column 或 region ），则它具有优先级。如果这样的中断不止一个，那么将使用流中最新出现的元素的值。因此， break-before break-after 值优先于先入后出的值，而先入后出的值又先于后入 break-inside 值。

trans-unit.source: If any of the three concerned values is an avoid break value (avoid, avoid-page, avoid-region, or avoid-column), no such break will be applied at that point.
trans-unit.target: 如果三个相关值中的任何一个是避免中断值（ avoid ， avoid-page ， avoid-region 或 avoid-column ），那么此时将不应用此类中断。

trans-unit.source: If any one of the radio buttons in a group is required, the :invalid pseudo-class is applied to all of them if none of the buttons in the group is selected. (Grouped radio buttons share the same value for their name attribute.)
trans-unit.target: 如果 required 组中的任何一个单选按钮，则如果未选择该组中的任何按钮，则 :invalid 伪类将应用于所有这些。（分组的单选按钮为其 name 属性共享相同的值。）

trans-unit.source: If at any time in the design process you find yourself using grid to relocate the position of an element, consider whether you should return to your document and make a change to the logical order too. The nice thing about using CSS Grid Layout is that you should be able to move an item in the source to match the logical order, without needing to make big changes to your layout. This is a huge improvement over a float-based layout for example, where document source matters a lot in order to get layouts at different breakpoints. However the onus is on us as developers to remember to go back to our source and update it to maintain logical order.
trans-unit.target: 如果在设计过程中的任何时候发现自己使用网格来重新定位元素的位置，请考虑是否应该返回文档并也更改逻辑顺序。使用CSS Grid Layout的好处是，您应该能够在源中移动项目以符合逻辑顺序，而无需对布局进行大的更改。例如，这是对基于 float 的布局的巨大改进，在浮动布局中，文档源对于在不同断点处获取布局至关重要。但是，作为开发人员，我们有责任记住回到源头并对其进行更新以保持逻辑顺序。

trans-unit.target: 如果两个形状均为 inset() 类型，则在形状函数中的每个值之间进行插值。

trans-unit.source: If both shapes are of type path(), both paths strings have the same number and types of path data commands in the same order, interpolate each path data command as real numbers.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个形状均为 path() 类型，则两个路径字符串都具有相同数量和相同顺序的路径数据命令类型，请将每个路径数据命令插入为实数。

trans-unit.target: 如果两个形状均为 polygon() 类型，则两个多边形具有相同数量的顶点，并使用相同的 <fill-rule> ，在形状函数中的每个值之间进行插值。

trans-unit.source: If both shapes are the same type, that type is ellipse() or circle(), and none of the radii use the closest-side or farthest-side keywords, interpolate between each value in the shape functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个形状是同一类型，则该类型是 ellipse() 或 circle() ，并且半径都不使用 closest-side 或 farthest-side 关键字，在形状函数中的每个值之间进行插值。

trans-unit.source: If both the beginning and end filters have a function list of the same length without <url>, each of their filter functions is interpolated according to its specific rules. If they have different lengths, the missing equivalent filter functions from the longer list are added to the end of the shorter list using their lacuna values, then all filter functions are interpolated according to their specific rules. If one filter is none, it is replaced with the filter functions list of the other one using the filter function default values, then all filter functions are interpolated according to their specific rules. Otherwise, discrete interpolation is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果开始过滤器和结束过滤器都具有相同长度的函数列表，但没有 <url> ，则会根据其特定规则对每个过滤器函数进行插值。如果它们的长度不同，则使用其空白值将较长列表中缺少的等效过滤器函数添加到较短列表的末尾，然后根据其特定规则对所有过滤器函数进行插值。如果一个过滤器为 none ，则使用过滤器功能默认值将其替换为另一过滤器的过滤器功能列表，然后根据其特定规则对所有过滤器功能进行插值。否则，将使用离散插值。

trans-unit.source: If it is omitted, a “sparse” algorithm is used, where the placement algorithm only ever moves “forward” in the grid when placing items, never backtracking to fill holes. This ensures that all of the auto-placed items appear “in order”, even if this leaves holes that could have been filled by later items.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则使用“稀疏”算法，其中，放置算法仅在放置项目时在网格中“向前”移动，而不会回溯以填充孔。这样可以确保所有自动放置的项目均“按顺序”显示，即使这会留下可能由以后的项目填充的孔。

trans-unit.source: If its outer display type is inline or run-in, and it is participating in a block or inline formatting context, then it generates an inline box. Otherwise it generates a block container box.

trans-unit.source: If multiple keyframe sets exist for a given name, the last one encountered by the parser is used. @keyframes rules don't cascade, so animations never derive keyframes from more than one rule set.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定名称存在多个关键帧集，则使用解析器遇到的最后一个关键帧集。 @keyframes 规则不会级联，因此动画永远不会从多个规则集中派生关键帧。

trans-unit.source: If multiple values are specified, each time the animation is played the next value in the list is used, cycling back to the first value after the last one is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了多个值,每次播放动画时都会使用列表中的下一个值,在使用完最后一个值后循环回到第一个值。
