trans-unit.source: If the browser does not support non-prefixed animation and animation is still false, we iterate over all the possible prefixes, since all the major browsers are currently prefixing this property and changing its name to AnimationName instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果浏览器不支持非前缀动画，并且 animation 仍为 false ，则我们将迭代所有可能的前缀，因为所有主流浏览器当前都为此属性加上前缀，并将其名称更改为 AnimationName 。

trans-unit.source: If the combined size of the items along the cross axis is less than the size of the alignment container and the item is auto-sized, its size is increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size of all auto-sized items exactly fills the alignment container along the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目在横轴上的组合大小小于对齐容器的大小，并且该项目是 auto 大小的，则其大小将平均增加（而不是成比例地增加），同时仍要遵守 max-height / max-width 施加的约束-宽度（或等效功能），以便所有 auto 大小的项的组合大小沿横轴正好填充对齐容器。

trans-unit.source: If the combined size of the items along the cross axis is less than the size of the alignment container, any auto-sized items have their size increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size exactly fills the alignment container along the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目沿横轴的组合大小小于对齐容器的大小，则所有 auto 大小的项目的大小均等（不成比例地）增加，同时仍要遵守 max-height / max-width 施加的约束（或等效功能），以便合并后的尺寸沿横轴准确填充对齐容器。

trans-unit.source: If the combined size of the items along the main axis is less than the size of the alignment container, any auto-sized items have their size increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size exactly fills the alignment container along the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目沿主轴的总大小小于对齐容器的大小，则所有 auto 大小的项目的大小均等（不成比例）增加，同时仍要遵守 max-height / max-width 施加的约束（或等效功能），以便合并后的尺寸沿主轴准确填充对齐容器。

trans-unit.source: If the combined size of the items is less than the size of the alignment container, any auto-sized items have their size increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size exactly fills the alignment container
trans-unit.target: 如果项目的总大小小于对齐容器的大小，则任何 auto 大小的项目的大小均等地（不成比例地）增加，同时仍要遵守 max-height / max-width （或等效功能）的限制），以便合并后的尺寸恰好填满对齐容器

trans-unit.source: If the combined size of the items is less than the size of the alignment container, any auto-sized items have their size increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size exactly fills the alignment container.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目的总大小小于对齐容器的大小，则任何 auto 大小的项目的大小均等地（不成比例地）增加，同时仍要遵守 max-height / max-width （或等效功能）的限制），以便合并后的尺寸恰好填满对齐容器。

trans-unit.source: If the control does not have focus, and the value is invalid, apply this pseudo-class.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件没有焦点,且数值无效,则应用此伪类。

trans-unit.source: If the control does not have focus, and the value is valid, apply this pseudo-class.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件没有焦点,且数值有效,则应用这个伪类。

trans-unit.source: If the control has focus, and the value was invalid when it gained focus, re-validate on every keystroke.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件有焦点,而在获得焦点时,值是无效的,则在每次按键时重新验证。

trans-unit.source: If the control has focus, and the value was valid (including empty) when it gained focus, apply this pseudo-class.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件有焦点,并且该值在获得焦点时是有效的(包括空),则应用这个伪类。

trans-unit.source: If the control has focus, and the value was valid (including empty) when it gained focus, do not apply the pseudo-class.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件有焦点,并且该值在获得焦点时是有效的(包括空),不要应用伪类。

trans-unit.source: If the counter value is negative, the symbol provided as value for the descriptor is prepended to the counter representation; and a second symbol if specified, will be appended to the representation. The negative descriptor has effect only if the system value is symbolic, alphabetic, numeric, additive, or extends, if the extended counter style itself uses a negative sign. If the negative descriptor is specified for other systems that don't support negative counter values, then the descriptor is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果计数器值是负数，则将为描述符提供的符号放在计数器表示形式的前面；第二个符号（如果指定）将附加到表示形式上。负描述符有效果只有当 system 值是 symbolic ， alphabetic ， numeric ， additive ，或 extends ，如果扩展计数器样式本身使用一个负号。如果为不支持负计数器值的其他系统指定了否定描述符，则忽略该描述符。

trans-unit.source: If the device supports touch events (for a touch screen), this is 1. Otherwise it's 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备支持触摸事件(对于触摸屏),则为1,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: If the device's user interface displays a backward arrow button at the beginning of scrollbars, this is 1. Otherwise it's 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备的用户界面在滚动条的开头显示一个向后的箭头按钮,则为1,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: If the device's user interface displays a backward arrow button at the end of scrollbars, this is 1. Otherwise it's 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备的用户界面在滚动条末端显示一个向后的箭头按钮,则为1,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: If the device's user interface displays a forward arrow button at the beginning of scrollbars, this is 1. Otherwise it's 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备的用户界面在滚动条的开头显示一个前进箭头按钮,则为1,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: If the device's user interface displays a forward arrow button at the end of scrollbars, this is 1. Otherwise it's 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备的用户界面在滚动条的末端显示一个前进箭头按钮,则为1,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: If the device's user interface displays the thumb of scrollbars proportionally (that is, sized based on the percentage of the document that is visible), this is 1. Otherwise it's 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备的用户界面按比例显示滚动条的拇指(即根据文档可见的百分比来确定大小),则为1,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: If the document's style sheet doesn't specify a value but it is an inherited property, the value will be taken from the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档的样式表没有指定一个值,但它是一个继承的属性,该值将从父元素中获取。

trans-unit.source: If the document's style sheet explicitly specifies a value for the property, the given value will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档的样式表明确指定了该属性的值,则会使用给定的值。

trans-unit.source: If the element has been transformed, the snap coordinates are likewise transformed, thus aligning the snap points with the element as it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素已被转换,快照坐标也同样被转换,从而使快照点与显示的元素对齐。

trans-unit.source: If the element has no background-image or background-color, this property will only have a visual effect when the border has transparent regions or partially opaque regions (due to border-style or border-image); otherwise, the border masks the difference.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素没有 background-image 或 background-color ，则此属性仅在边框具有透明区域或部分不透明的区域（由于 border-style 或 border-image ）时才具有视觉效果；否则，边框将掩盖差异。

trans-unit.source: If the element is an editable element, the computed value is contain
trans-unit.target: 如果元素是可编辑元素，则计算的值 contain

trans-unit.source: If the element is inline, this value opens an additional level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm. The direction of this embedding level is given by the direction property.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素是内联的，则此值相对于双向算法将打开一个附加的嵌入级别。此嵌入级别的 direction 由direction属性给出。

trans-unit.source: If the element is required, the preceding rules apply only if the user has changed the value or attempted to submit the form.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素是必需的,那么只有当用户更改了值或试图提交表单时,前面的规则才适用。

trans-unit.source: If the exact weight given is unavailable, then the following rule is used to determine the weight actually rendered:
trans-unit.target: 如果无法获得准确的权重,则使用以下规则来确定实际呈现的权重。

trans-unit.source: If the font size is 20 pixels or higher, Firefox treats auto as optimizeLegibility. For smaller text, Firefox treats auto as optimizeSpeed. The 20-pixel threshold can be changed with the browser.display.auto_quality_min_font_size preference.
trans-unit.target: 如果字体大小为20像素或更大，则Firefox将 auto 视为 optimizeLegibility 。对于较小的文本，Firefox将 auto 视为 optimizeSpeed 。可以使用 browser.display.auto_quality_min_font_size 首选项更改20像素阈值。

trans-unit.source: If the form also contains optional inputs, required inputs should be indicated visually using a treatment that does not rely solely on color to convey meaning. Typically, descriptive text and/or an icon are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果表单还包含可选输入，则应使用不仅仅依靠颜色来传达含义的处理方式在视觉上指示所需的输入。通常，使用描述性文本和/或图标。

trans-unit.source: If the given unit is a relative length, attr() computes it to an absolute length.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的单位是相对长度，则 attr() 会将其计算为绝对长度。

trans-unit.source: If the given value is used as a length, attr() computes it to an absolute length.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定值用作长度，则 attr() 会将其计算为绝对长度。

trans-unit.source: If the grid container has a definite or maximal size in the relevant axis, then the number of repetitions is the largest possible positive integer that does not cause the grid to overflow its grid container. Treating each track as its maximal track sizing function, if that is definite. Otherwise, as its minimum track sizing function, and taking grid-gap into account. If any number of repetitions would overflow, then the repetition is 1. Otherwise, if the grid container has a definite minimal size in the relevant axis, the number of repetitions is the smallest possible positive integer that fulfills that minimum requirement. Otherwise, the specified track list repeats only once.
trans-unit.target: 如果网格容器在相关轴上具有确定或最大的大小，则重复次数是最大可能的正整数，不会导致网格溢出其网格容器。如果这是确定的，则将每个轨道视为其最大轨道大小调整函数。否则，将其作为最小的轨道大小调整功能，并考虑网格间距。如果任何数量的重复将溢出，则重复为 1 。否则，如果网格容器在相关轴上具有确定的最小大小，则重复次数是满足该最小要求的可能的最小正整数。否则，指定的曲目列表仅重复一次。

trans-unit.source: If the iframe is set to 50vw, it will be 50% of the width of the 1200px parent document in our example above, or 600px, with 1vw being 6px. When zoomed in, the iframe shrinks to 400px and 1vw becomes 4px.
trans-unit.target: 如果iframe设置为50vw，则将是上述示例中 1200px 父文档宽度的50％，即 600px ，其中 1vw 为 6px 。放大时，iframe缩小至 400px ,而 1vw 变为 4px 。

trans-unit.source: If the image has an intrinsic proportion, then render it using the specified dimension and compute the other dimension from the specified dimension and the intrinsic proportion. If the image has no intrinsic proportion, use the specified dimension for that dimension. For the other dimension, use the image's corresponding intrinsic dimension if there is one. If there is no such intrinsic dimension, use the corresponding dimension of the mask positioning area.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像有内在比例,则使用指定的维度进行渲染,并从指定的维度和内在比例计算其他维度。如果图像没有固有比例,则使用该维度的指定维度。对于另一个维度,使用图像对应的固有维度(如果有)。如果没有这样的固有尺寸,则使用遮罩定位区域的相应尺寸。

trans-unit.source: If the image has an intrinsic ratio (that is, its width:height ratio is constant, such as 16:9, 4:3, 2.39:1, 1:1, and so forth), the rendered size preserves that ratio.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像有一个固有的比例(即它的宽:高比例是恒定的,如16:9、4:3、2.39:1、1:1等),则渲染后的尺寸会保留这个比例。

trans-unit.source: If the image has both horizontal and vertical intrinsic dimensions, it's rendered at that size.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像同时具有水平和垂直的内在尺寸,则按该尺寸渲染。

trans-unit.source: If the image has both intrinsic dimensions, it is rendered at that size. If it has no intrinsic dimensions and no intrinsic proportion, it is rendered at the size of the mask positioning area. If it has no dimensions but has a proportion, it's rendered as if contain had been specified instead. If the image has one intrinsic dimension and a proportion, it's rendered at the size determined by that one dimension and the proportion. If the image has one intrinsic dimension but no proportion, it's rendered using the intrinsic dimension and the corresponding dimension of the mask positioning area.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像具有两个固有尺寸，则以该尺寸渲染。如果没有固有尺寸且没有固有比例，则以蒙版定位区域的大小进行渲染。如果没有尺寸而是有比例，则将其渲染为 contain 已被指定。如果图像具有一个固有尺寸和比例，则以该尺寸和比例确定的尺寸进行渲染。如果图像具有一个固有尺寸但没有比例，则使用固有尺寸和蒙版定位区域的相应尺寸进行渲染。

trans-unit.source: If the image has intrinsic proportions, it's stretched to the specified dimension. The unspecified dimension is computed using the specified dimension and the intrinsic proportions.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像有固有的比例,它将被拉伸到指定的尺寸。未指定的尺寸是用指定的尺寸和固有比例计算出来的。

trans-unit.source: If the image has no dimensions or intrinsic ratio, rule 4 applies, and we use the background area's dimension to determine the value for the auto dimension.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像没有尺寸或固有比率，则规则4适用，并且我们使用背景区域的尺寸来确定 auto 尺寸的值。

trans-unit.source: If the image has no intrinsic dimensions and has no intrinsic proportions, it's rendered at the size of the background positioning area.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像没有内在尺寸,也没有内在比例,则按背景定位区域的大小渲染。

trans-unit.source: If the image has no intrinsic dimensions but has intrinsic proportions, it's rendered as if contain had been specified instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像没有固有尺寸而是具有固有比例，则将其渲染为好像已指定了 contain 。

trans-unit.source: If the image has no intrinsic proportions, it's stretched to the specified dimension. The unspecified dimension is computed using the image's corresponding intrinsic dimension, if there is one. If there is no such intrinsic dimension, it becomes the corresponding dimension of the background positioning area.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像没有固有比例,则将其拉伸到指定尺寸。未指定的尺寸是利用图像对应的固有尺寸(如果有的话)计算出来的。如果没有这样的固有尺寸,则成为背景定位区域的对应尺寸。

trans-unit.source: If the image has one specified dimension but no intrinsic ratio, that specified dimension is used per rule 3 if that dimension is set to auto in the CSS.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像具有一个指定的尺寸，但没有固有比率，则在CSS 中将规则3设置为 auto 时，将使用该指定的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: If the image has only one intrinsic dimension and has intrinsic proportions, it's rendered at the size corresponding to that one dimension. The other dimension is computed using the specified dimension and the intrinsic proportions.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像只有一个固有尺寸和固有比例,则以该尺寸对应的尺寸渲染。另一个维度则使用指定的维度和固有比例计算。

trans-unit.source: If the image has only one intrinsic dimension but has no intrinsic proportions, it's rendered using the specified dimension and the other dimension of the background positioning area.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像只有一个固有维度,但没有固有比例,则使用指定的维度和背景定位区域的另一个维度进行渲染。

trans-unit.source: If the image specifies a size, and the size isn't modified by constrain or cover, that specified size wins.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像指定了一个尺寸,并且该尺寸没有被constrain或cover修改,则指定的尺寸获胜。

trans-unit.source: If the intent is to create a "blanket" style that will apply to all targeted elements, then the universal selector comes in handy:
trans-unit.target: 如果打算创建一个适用于所有目标元素的 "空白 "样式,那么通用选择器就会派上用场。

trans-unit.source: If the items don’t have a size then the content's size is used as the flex-basis. This is why when we just declare display: flex on the parent to create flex items, the items all move into a row and take only as much space as they need to display their contents.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目没有大小，则将内容的大小用作伸缩基础。这就是为什么当我们只在父级上声明 display: flex 以创建flex项目时，这些项目全部移入一行并且仅占用它们显示内容所需要的空间的原因。

trans-unit.source: If the lower bound of any range is higher than the upper bound, the entire descriptor is invalid and will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何范围的下界高于上界,整个描述符无效,并将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the main axis is in the block direction because flex-direction is set to column, then justify-content will distribute space between items in that dimension as long as there is space in the flex container to distribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于 flex-direction 设置为 column 而主轴位于块方向，那么只要flex容器中有空间可分配，则 justify-content 将在该维度中的项目之间分配空间。

trans-unit.source: If the output device is a printer, and to save ink, dark or extremely dense background images might be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果输出设备是打印机,为了节省墨水,可能会删除深色或密度极高的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: If the property has a value different than none, a stacking context will be created. In that case, the object will act as a containing block for any position: fixed elements that it contains.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性的值不同于 none ，则将创建一个堆栈上下文。在这种情况下，该对象将充当任何 position: fixed 的包含块：它包含的固定元素。

trans-unit.source: If the second and third values are missing they are given a value of auto.
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少第二个和第三个值,它们的值为自动。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the item overflows the alignment container, the item is instead aligned as if the alignment mode were start.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目的大小溢出对齐容器，则将对齐该项目，就像对齐模式为 start 一样。

trans-unit.source: If the spanning element is inside another element which has margins, padding and a border or a background color, it is possible to end up with the top of the box appearing above the spanner and the rest displaying below, as shown in the next example. For this reason, some care should be taken when deciding to make an element a spanner and ensure this scenario is accounted for.
trans-unit.target: 如果跨接元素在另一个有页边距、padding和边框或背景色的元素里面,就有可能最终导致框的顶部出现在扳手的上方,而其他部分显示在下方,如下一个例子所示。出于这个原因,在决定将一个元素变成扳手时,应该小心翼翼,并确保考虑到这种情况。

trans-unit.source: If the specified decoration has a specific semantic meaning, like a line-through line meaning that some text has been deleted, authors are encouraged to denote this meaning using an HTML tag, like <del> or <s>. As browsers can disable styling in some cases, the semantic meaning won't disappear in such a situation.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的修饰具有特定的语义含义，例如直通行表示某些文本已被删除，则鼓励作者使用HTML标记（例如 <del> 或 <s> )来表示此含义。由于在某些情况下浏览器可以禁用样式，因此语义含义不会消失。

trans-unit.source: If the specified size defines both the width and the height, these values are used as the concrete object size.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的大小同时定义了width和height，则这些值将用作具体对象的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the specified size defines neither the width nor the height, the concrete object size is calculated so that it matches the intrinsic aspect ratio of the image but without exceeding the default object size in any dimension. If the image has no intrinsic aspect ratio, the intrinsic aspect ratio of the object it applies to is used; if this object has none, the missing width or height are taken from the default object size.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的尺寸未定义width或height，则将计算具体的对象尺寸，以使其与图像的固有长宽比匹配，但不超出任何尺寸的默认对象尺寸。如果图像没有固有长宽比，则使用它应用于对象的固有长宽比；如果该对象没有对象，则缺少的宽度或高度将从默认对象大小中获取。

trans-unit.source: If the specified size defines only the width or only the height, the missing value is determined using the intrinsic ratio, if there is any, the intrinsic dimensions if the specified value matches, or the default object size for that missing value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的大小仅定义宽度或高度，则使用固有比率（如果有）确定缺失值，如果指定值匹配，则确定固有尺寸，或者使用该缺失值的默认对象大小。

trans-unit.source: If the table layout were auto, the table would grow to accomodate its contents, despite the specified width.
trans-unit.target: 如果表格布局是 auto ，则尽管指定了 width ，表格也会增长以容纳其内容。

trans-unit.source: If the target weight given is between 400 and 500 inclusive:
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的目标体重在 400 到 500 之间（含）：

trans-unit.source: If the third value is missing it is equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少第三个值,则等于第二个值。

trans-unit.source: If the user agent is using Maemo with the original theme, this is 1. If it's using the newer Fremantle theme, this is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户代理使用的是原主题的Maemo,则为1,如果使用的是较新的Fremantle主题,则为0。

trans-unit.source: If the user has configured their device to use the "Graphite" appearance on Mac OS X, this is 1. If the user is using the standard blue appearance, or is not on Mac OS X, this is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户在Mac OS X上将设备配置为使用 "Graphite "外观,则该值为1;如果用户使用标准的蓝色外观,或者不在Mac OS X上,则该值为0。

trans-unit.source: If the user is using Windows Glass theme, this is 1; otherwise it's 0. Note that this only exists for Windows 7 and earlier.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户使用的是Windows Glass主题,则该值为1,否则为0.请注意,该值只存在于Windows 7及更早版本。

trans-unit.source: If the user is using Windows unthemed (in classic mode instead of using uxtheme), this is 1. Otherwise it's 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户使用的是Windows非主题(在经典模式下,而不是使用uxtheme),则为1,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: If the writing mode is vertically oriented, the value of block-size relates to the width of the element; otherwise, it relates to the height of the element. A related property is inline-size, which defines the other dimension of the element.

trans-unit.source: If the writing mode is vertically oriented, the value of inline-size relates to the height of the element; otherwise, it relates to the width of the element. A related property is block-size, which defines the other dimension of the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果书写模式是垂直方向，则 inline-size 的值与元素的高度有关；否则，它与元素的宽度有关。一个相关的属性是 block-size ，它定义元素的其他尺寸。

trans-unit.source: If the writing mode is vertically oriented, the value of min-block-size relates to the minimum width of the element; otherwise, it relates to the minimum height of the element. A related property is min-inline-size, which defines the other dimension of the element.

trans-unit.target: 如果书写模式是垂直方向，则 min-inline-size 的值与元素的最小高度有关；否则，它与元素的最小宽度有关。一个相关的属性是 min-block-size ，它定义元素的其他尺寸。

trans-unit.source: If there is no border, padding, inline content, height, or min-height to separate a block's margin-top from its margin-bottom, then its top and bottom margins collapse.

trans-unit.source: If there is no border, padding, inline part, block formatting context created, or clearance to separate the margin-top of a block from the margin-top of its first child block; or no border, padding, inline content, height, min-height, or max-height to separate the margin-bottom of a block from the margin-bottom of its last child, then those margins collapse. The collapsed margin ends up outside the parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有边界，填充，内联部分，块格式化上下文创建，或者间隙来分隔 margin-top 从一个块的 margin-top 其第一个子块的;或没有边框，内边距，内联内容， height ， min-height 或 max-height 来将块的 margin-bottom 与最后一个子元素的 margin-bottom 分开，则这些边距会崩溃。折叠的边距最终在父级之外。

trans-unit.source: If there is no border, padding, inline part, block formatting context created, or clearance to separate the margin-top of a block from the margin-top of its first child block; or no border, padding, inline content, height, min-height, or max-height to separate the margin-bottom of a block from the margin-bottom of its last child, then those margins collapse. The collapsed margin ends up outside the parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有边界，填充，内联部分，块格式化上下文创建，或者间隙来分隔 margin-top 从一个块的 margin-top 其第一个子块的;或没有边框，内边距，内联内容， height ， min-height 或 max-height 来将块的 margin-bottom 与最后一个子元素的 margin-bottom 分开，则这些边距会崩溃。折叠的边距最终在父级之外。

trans-unit.source: If there isn't already a style sheet, a new <style> element is created, and its content is set to the value of keyframes. Then the new <style> element is inserted into the document's <head>, thereby adding the new style sheet to the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果还没有样式表，则会创建一个新的 <style> 元素，并将其内容设置为关键帧的值。然后，将新的 <style> 元素插入文档的 <head> 中，从而将新的样式表添加到文档中。

trans-unit.source: If this causes a problem for your layout it may require a rethinking of the structure, for example putting each row into a separate flex container in order that they can’t shift rows.

trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值大于元素的 border-width ，则边框图像将超出填充（和/或内容）边缘。

trans-unit.source: If three values are set, the first one applies to the top-Left corner, the second one to the top-right and bottom-left corners and the third one to the bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置三个值,第一个适用于左上角,第二个适用于右上角和左下角,第三个适用于右下角。

trans-unit.target: 如果指定了两个<grid-line>值，则将 grid-row-start 的正手设置为斜线之前的值，并将 grid-row-end 的正手设置为斜线之后的值。

trans-unit.source: If two <grid-line> values are given they are separated by "/". The grid-column-start longhand is set to the value before the slash, and the grid-column-end longhand is set to the value after the slash.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出两个 <grid-line> 值，它们之间用“ /”分隔。将 grid-column-start 的正手设置为斜线之前的值，并将 grid-column-end 的正手设置为斜线之后的值。

trans-unit.source: If two or more values are defined and either no value is a keyword, or the only used keyword is center, then the first value represents the horizontal offset and the second represents the vertical offset.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了两个或多个值，或者没有值是关键字，或者唯一使用的关键字是 center ，则第一个值代表水平偏移，第二个值代表垂直偏移。

trans-unit.source: If two values are given, the first sets width and the second sets height.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出两个值,第一个设置宽度,第二个设置高度。

trans-unit.source: If two values are set, the first one applies to the top-left and bottom-right corners and the second one to the top-right and bottom-left corners.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置两个值,第一个值适用于左上角和右下角,第二个值适用于右上角和左下角。

trans-unit.source: If two viewport values are provided the first value will be set to the min-width and the second value will be set max-width.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供两个视口值,第一个值将被设置为最小宽度,第二个值将被设置为最大宽度。

trans-unit.source: If two viewport values are provided, the first value will set the minimum height and the second value will set the maximum height.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供两个视口值,第一个值将设置最小高度,第二个值将设置最大高度。

trans-unit.source: If used in conjunction with other CSS properties, such as a transform function, any image-orientation rotation is applied before any other transformations.
trans-unit.target: 如果与其他CSS属性(如变换函数)一起使用,任何图像方向的旋转都会在任何其他变换之前应用。

trans-unit.source: If value is auto, then for cyclic, numeric, and fixed system, the range will be from negative infinity to positive infinity. For alphabetic and symbolic systems, range will be from 1 to positive infinity. For additive systems, auto will result in the range 0 to positive infinity. For extends systems, the range is whatever auto will produce for the extended system.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是自动的,那么对于循环、数字和固定系统,范围将从负无穷到正无穷。对于字母和符号系统,范围将从1到正无穷大。对于加法系统,auto将导致范围从0到正无穷大。对于扩展系统,范围是任何自动产生的扩展系统的范围。

trans-unit.source: If we add writing-mode: vertical-lr to the grid container, we can see that the block and inline Axis are now running in a different direction. The block or column axis now runs across the page from left to right, Inline runs down the page, creating rows from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: 如果在网格容器中添加 writing-mode: vertical-lr ，我们可以看到块和内联Axis现在都朝着不同的方向运行。现在，块轴或列轴从左到右在页面上运行，内联线在页面上向下运行，从上到下创建行。

trans-unit.source: If we change flex-direction to column the main axis switches and our items now display in a column. Set column-reverse and the start and end lines are again switched.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们将 flex-direction 更改为 column 则主轴开关和我们的项目现在显示在列中。设置 column-reverse ，然后再次切换开始和结束行。

trans-unit.source: If we change our flex-direction to column, align-items and align-self will align the items to the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们将 flex-direction 更改为column，则 align-items 和 align-self 会将项目左右对齐。

trans-unit.source: If we create a very similar layout using Grid, we can control the layout in both rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们使用Grid创建一个非常类似的布局,我们可以控制行和列的布局。

trans-unit.source: If we dropped this list into a document as-is, there would be no apparent indentation and the markers would be in danger of falling off the left edge of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们把这个列表原封不动地放进文档中,就不会有明显的缩进,标记就有可能从浏览器窗口的左边缘掉下来。

trans-unit.source: If we gave all of our items in the example above a flex-grow value of 1 then the available space in the flex container would be equally shared between our items and they would stretch to fill the container on the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们将示例中的所有项目的 flex-grow 值都设置为1，则flex容器中的可用空间将在我们的项目之间平均分配，并且它们将拉伸以填充主轴上的容器。

trans-unit.source: If we have an intrinsic ratio with a fixed dimension, that fixes both dimensions in place. Knowing one dimension and a ratio is, as has been mentioned already, the same as specifying both dimensions explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们有一个固定维度的固有比,那就把这两个维度固定在了一起。知道一个维度和一个比值,就像前面已经提到的那样,等于把这两个维度都明文规定了。

trans-unit.source: If we have three 100 pixel-wide items in a container which is 500 pixels wide, then the space we need to lay out our items is 300 pixels. This leaves 200 pixels of available space. If we don’t change the initial values then flexbox will put that space after the last item.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们在一个500像素宽的容器中有3个100像素宽的项目，那么我们需要布置项目的空间为300像素。剩下200像素的可用空间。如果我们不更改初始值，则flexbox将在最后一项之后放置该空间。

trans-unit.source: If we instead would like the items to grow and fill the space, then we need to have a method of distributing the leftover space between the items. This is what the flex properties that we apply to the items themselves, will do.
trans-unit.target: 相反，如果我们希望项目增加并填充空间，那么我们需要一种在项目之间分配剩余空间的方法。这就是我们将应用于这些项目本身的 flex 属性。

trans-unit.source: If we look back at the example where I demonstrated the difference between one and two-dimensional layouts, you can see there is a difference between the way of the two layouts work responsively. With the flex layout, if we drag our window wider and smaller, the flexbox does a nice job of adjusting the number of items in each row according to the available space. If we have a lot of space all five items can fit on one row. If we have a very narrow container we may only have space for one.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们回过头来看看我演示一维布局和二维布局的例子,你可以看到这两种布局的工作方式是有区别的。在弹性布局中,如果我们把窗口拖得更宽更小,弹性框就会很好地根据可用空间调整每行的项目数量。如果我们有很大的空间,所有五个项目都可以放在一行。如果我们有一个非常狭窄的容器,我们可能只有一个空间。

trans-unit.source: If we now take a look at a grid layout example, we can see how changing the writing mode means changing our idea of where the Block and Inline Axis are.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们现在来看一个网格布局的例子,我们可以看到改变书写模式意味着如何改变我们对Block和Inline Axis位置的想法。

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with flexbox then you will already have encountered the way in which flex items can be properly aligned inside the flex container. These alignment properties that we first met in the flexbox specification have been moved into a new specification called Box Alignment Level 3. This specification has details for how alignment should work in all of the different layout methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果您熟悉flexbox，那么您将已经遇到了可以在flex容器内正确对齐flex项的方法。我们在flexbox规范中首次遇到的这些对齐属性已被移到称为Box Alignment Level 3的新规范中。该规范详细说明了对齐方式在所有不同的布局方法中应如何工作。

trans-unit.source: If you are using display: table for your legacy layout, an item set to display: table-cell generates anonymous boxes. Therefore, if you use display: table-cell without any parent element set to display-table, an anonymous table wrapper is created around any adjacent cells, just as if you had wrapped them in a div or other element set to display: table. If you have an item set to display: table-cell, and then in a feature query change the parent to display: grid, this anonymous box creation will not happen. This means you can overwrite display: table based layouts, without having additional anonymous boxes.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 display: table 用于旧版布局，则设置为 display: table-cell 的项目将生成匿名框。因此，如果您使用 display: table-cell 而不将任何父元素设置为 display-table ，则会在任何相邻单元格周围创建一个匿名表包装器，就像您将它们包装在div或其他设置为 display: table 元素中一样。如果您将项目设置为 display: table-cell ，然后在功能查询中将父项更改为 display: grid ，则不会发生此匿名框的创建。这意味着您可以覆盖 display: table 基于表格的布局，而无需其他匿名框。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a reverse value, or otherwise reordering your items, you should consider whether you actually need to change the logical order in the source. The specification continues with a warning not to use reordering to fix issues in your source:
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在使用一个反向值,或者以其他方式重新排序你的项目,你应该考虑你是否真的需要改变源中的逻辑顺序。该规范继续警告不要使用重新排序来解决你的源中的问题。

trans-unit.source: If you are using flexbox and find yourself disabling some of the flexibility, you probably need to use CSS Grid Layout. An example would be if you are setting a percentage width on a flex item to make it line up with other items in a row above. In that case, a grid is likely to be a better choice.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在使用flexbox,并发现自己禁用了一些灵活性,你可能需要使用CSS Grid Layout。一个例子是,如果你正在设置一个弹性项目的百分比宽度,使其与上面一行的其他项目对齐。在这种情况下,网格可能是一个更好的选择。

trans-unit.source: If you change flex-direction to one of the reverse values, then they will lay themselves out from the end axis and in the reverse order to the way words are written in the language of your document. flex-start will then change to the end of that axis — so to the location where your lines would wrap if working in rows, or at the end of your last paragraph of text in the block direction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将flex-direction更改为反向值之一，则它们将沿端轴布局，并以与文档语言书写单词的方式相反的顺序排列。然后， flex-start 将更改为该轴的末尾-因此，如果行中行，则行将换行的位置，也将变为块方向上文本的最后一段的末尾。
